C’est une activité qu’elle a choisi par nécessité  dans le but de se procurer des revenus qui serviront à régler  ses besoins sociaux. Elle  est sociétaire de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC et sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de produits qu’elle commercialise. Elle souhaite développer davantage son activité de commerce et accroitre ses bénéfices dans le but de mieux se prendre en charge et  en même temps  soutenir sa famille.
texts.en: Ms. Ndeye Coumba lives in Senegal. She is 48 years old and has been involved in selling fabric, women's accessories, and various other products for several years. She chose this business by necessity with the goal of earning an income that would serve to meet her social needs. She is a member of a branch of U-IMCEC and is seeking a loan of 150,000 Frs to buy the products that she sells. She hopes to further develop her business and increase her profits with the goal of taking better care of herself and supporting her family at the same time.

loans.use: To buy and re-sell fabric and women's accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay her suppliers for a delivery of fabric meant for resale.

loans.name: Brisa Group

texts.es: las nuevas integrantes del grupo son la señora Maribel va a comprar con su credito carne de cerdo y utencilios para su carniceria, la serora patricia va a compra Topperware por mayoreo, las demas integrantes sigen en su negocio con su actividad que tienen. La señora Demetria Cristina tiene 46 años de edad ella es casada tiene 3 hijos 2 hombres y una mujer, solo estudia el niño más pequeño en la primaria los otros dos ya son mayores, ella tiene su negocio una cocina económica vende guisados, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar verduras, carnes, azúcar, refrescos para elaborar la comida, su negocio es importante porque obtiene beneficios para su casa, a ella le gusta atender a sus clientes que son choferes, transportistas y trabajadores de oficina, ella se siente orgullosa de tener su negocio y obtener ingresos para beneficio de su persona y su casa, sus sueños y esperanzas son estar mejor con la familia y que sus hijos se superen y estén bien de salud. Ella está feliz con este préstamo le dan la oportunidad de surtir su negocio. Las integrantes del grupo le quieren decir a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “muchas gracias por sus préstamos, que dios los cuide y que nos sigan ayudando con sus préstamos”.
texts.en:
The new group members are Maribel who will use the loan to buy pork and utensils for her butcher shop and Patricia who will buy Tupperware at wholesale.  The rest of the members continue with their same business and activities.

Demetria Cristina, 46, is married and has three children: two boys and one girl.  Only the youngest is still in elementary school; the rest are all older.  She has her business selling inexpensive meals.  She requested her loan to buy vegetables, meats, sugar and soft-drinks to prepare her dishes.  Her business is important because she obtains benefits for her household.  She enjoys taking care of her customers who are truck drivers, taxi drivers, and office personnel.  She feels proud to have her business and to obtain income for herself personally and for her family.  Her dreams and hopes are to be in a better family relationship and that her children improve themselves and are in good health. She is happy with this loan which gives her the opportunity to stock her business.  

The group members want to say to Kiva and to Fundación Realidad:  “thank you very much for the loans.  May God keep you and please continue helping us with your loans.”

loans.use: to buy chilies, green tomatoes, red tomatoes, vegetables, meats, sugar and soft-drinks.

loans.name: Mame Bouye

texts.fr: Madame Mame  Bouye est âgée de  35 ans et habite au  Sénégal. Elle est mariée et mère de 6 enfants dont l’âge  varie entre 1 et 16 ans.  Elle exerce l’activité de commerce et de vente de  légumes depuis  plus de 10 ans.  Elle a choisi son activité par passion mais aussi pour aider sa famille.  Ce qui l’intéresse  surtout  ce sont les bénéfices que lui  procure son activité. Elle est membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC de la localité ou elle vit et a déjà remboursé 2 prêts  antérieurs.  Elle emprunte un montant de 200 000 frs qui sera orienté vers le renforcement  et la diversification des produits qu’elle commercialise.  L’augmentation de ses gains lui permettra d’améliorer la condition de vie sociale de sa famille.
texts.en: Ms. Mame Bouye is 35 years old and lives in Senegal. She is married and has six children whose ages vary between 1 and 16. She has run a business buying and selling vegetables for over 10 years. She chose this activity both because of her passion for it and also to help her family. What interests her most are the profits she earns from her business. She is a member of a branch of U-IMCEC in the area where she lives and has already repaid two previous loans. She is borrowing a loan of 200,000 Frs, which will be steered towards increasing and diversifying the products she sells. Her increased profits will allow her to improve her family's social living conditions.

loans.use: To buy and re-sell vegetables.

loans.name: Dan Mady

texts.fr: Monsieur Dan vit sur le territoire  Sénégalais depuis plusieurs années. Il y est marié et est  père d’un enfant d’un an.  Il évolue dans le secteur du commerce  et s’active dans la vente de produits alimentaires dans le marché de la localité ou il vit. Il a choisi son activité par passion mais aussi dans le but d’aider sa famille a travers les profits que lui procure son activité. Il est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC  de la dite localité. Ill sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de produits alimentaires destinés à renforcer le stock de son local. Avec l’augmentation de son fond de roulement il compte accroitre ses bénéfices et améliorer la situation sociale de sa famille.
texts.en: Mr. Dan has lived in Senegal for several years. He is married and has a 1-year-old child. He is involved in local commerce and has a business selling food products in the local market in the area where he lives. He chose this business both because of his passion for it and also in order to help his family through the profits he earns. He is a member of the local branch of U-IMCEC in his area. He is seeking a loan of 300,000 Frs destined to buy food products in order to increase his stocks. By increasing his working capital, he intends to raise his profits and improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: To buy and re-sell food products.

loans.name: María Concepción

texts.es:
La señora María Concepción tiene ya más de diez años con su negocio de venta de artículos de uso personal y escolar. 
Solicita un préstamo para invertir en compra de artículos navideños para vender, ya que tiene varios pedidos pendientes para entregar y no quiere quedarles mal a sus clientes. 
Con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas planea pagar el crédito ya que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para ella y su hijo quien esta estudiando. 
Desea que su negocio tenga más inventario y así más ganancias y podrá ayudar a su hijo a terminar su carrera profesional.
texts.en:
For more than ten years now, María Concepción has sold personal products and school supplies. 

She is requesting a loan to invest in buying Christmas items to sell, since she has various pending orders to deliver, and she does not want to disappoint her customers. 
 
She plans to pay off the loan with part of the earnings she obtains from these sales, since this work is her source of income for herself and her son, who is a student. 
 
She would like her business to have more inventory and thus more earnings, so that she can help her son complete his professional studies.

loans.use: to buy holiday items to sell.

loans.name: Odila

texts.es: Odilia tiene 54 años, es una mujer dinámica y muy alegre. Esta separada de su esposo, pero vive en compañía de su hijo, nuera y su nieto recién nacido, a los que apoya con techo y comida. La actividad que realiza Odilia es la venta de plátanos y yucas, para esto cuenta con un pequeño puesto en el mercado informal de su ciudad. Viene realizando esta actividad desde hace más de diez años. Es así que su día laboral empieza desde muy temprano, se dirige al puerto fluvial más cercano a esperar la llegada de los productores donde logra comprar sus frutos entre ellos el plátano y la yuca a un precio muy bajo. LO que luego los lleva a su puesto de venta. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es el poder mantenerse ocupada y estar en actividad, además que tiene un ingreso económico que le permite solventar los gastos de su hogar. Sin embargo el cansancio físico ya no le permite estar con el mismo ritmo de trabajo de antes, pero sabe que debe hacerlo de ello depende para tener ganancias. Este sería el primer crédito con MFP, esta contenta de poder contar con el apoyo de todos ustedes. Con el préstamo solicitado, comprará plátanos y yucas en mayor cantidad, esto le permitirá poder tener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Odilia is 54 years old.  She is a dynamic and very cheerful woman.  She is separated from her husband but lives together with her son, daughter-in-law and newborn grandson, who she supports with a home and food.  Odila's business is selling bananas and cassava.  She has a small stall in the informal market in her city.  She has been in this business for more than ten years.  Her day's work starts very early in the morning when she heads to the nearest river port to await the arrival of the farmers from whom she buys her fruits, including bananas and cassava, at a very low price.  She then takes these to her stall to sell.  What Odilia enjoys about her work is that she is able to keep herself busy and active.  She also makes income which enables her to cover her household expenses.  The physical exhaustion no longer allows her to keep up the same pace as she used to but she knows that she must continue working as her profits depend on it.

This will be Odilia's first loan from MFP.  She is happy that she is able to count on your support.  She will use the loan she has requested to buy bananas and cassava in larger quantities.  This will enable her to make more profits.

loans.use: to buy bananas and cassava wholesale

loans.name: Camino Al Mar Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Camino al Mar”, lo conforman 20 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran artesanía, venta de leña, venta de ropa, procesamiento de vellón (piel o lana de oveja), entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Puerto Montt. 
Marina integrante del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra en la segunda fila, en el lugar de en medio, sonriendo, quien además usa su cabello corto y un sweater color café. Se dedica al rubro de la artesanía específicamente realizando telares mapuches y tejidos.
Se dedica a éste oficio desde hace un año y medio. Ella ha sido autónoma con sus aprendizajes, pero también ha realizado algunos cursos de artesanía, costuras telares, comenta que siempre es bueno aprender, ya que de esta manera va innovando con productos exclusivos. Sus productos los comercializa en una feria artesanal municipal, donde arrienda un puesto y una carpa, además su hija ofrece sus productos por internet, los cuales también se venden. Comenta que la temporada de más alta demanda es durante el verano, ya que es en esta fecha donde llega una gran cantidad de turistas y cruceros. Su mercadería la compra en una pequeña distribuidora, lugar donde se especializan en el proceso de la lana.
Con el crédito comprará lana hilada y vellón.
Las metas para su negocio son tener un local propio que le brinde una estabilidad económica. 
Marina vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijos de 28 y 16 años de edad, sus sueños a nivel personal son seguir prosperando en su negocio, para poder brindarle a su familia un mejor bienestar en su calidad de vida. 
Las motivaciones de Marina de continuar con la artesanía se deben a que disfruta mucho lo que realiza. 
Marina está muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios entregados por Fondo Esperanza, sobre todo por el buen trato y acogida.
Respecto al grupo del Banco comunal del cual forma parte, comenta que ha sido una buena experiencia y que los demás emprendedores han sido comprometidos con el grupo y cada uno de sus negocios. Las capacitaciones por su parte le han servido para llevar bien su negocio.
Puerto Montt es una ciudad del sur de Chile, ubicada en la región de Los Lagos. Una de las atracciones de Puerto Montt son sus bellos paisajes verdes; sus playas poco frecuentadas; su gastronomía y especialmente la reputación de sus pescados y mariscos y sus artesanías. Es también la puerta de entrada a la Isla Grande de Chiloé, rica en tradiciones y leyendas.
texts.en:
This community bank is called "Camino al Mar" and it is made up of 20 entrepreneurs who work in different fields including handicrafts, selling firewood, selling clothing, processing fleece (sheep skin or wool), etc.  All of the bank's members live in the city of Puerto Montt.

Marina is a member of this community bank.  She is in the second row of the photo, in the middle.  She is smiling, has short hair, and is wearing a coffee-colored sweater.  She is in the craft business.  In particular, she makes Mapuche [Indian] woven items and knitted items.

Marina has been in this business for one and a half years.  She is mainly self taught but has also taken some craft courses in weaving and sewing.  She says that it is always good to learn as this means that she is able to continue innovating with exclusive products.  She sells her products in a municipal craft fair where she rents a stall and canopy.  In addition, her daughter sells her products on the Internet.  She says that her peak season is during the summer as this is when there are a lot of tourists and cruises.  She buys her merchandise from a small wholesaler's where they specialize in processing yarn.  Marina will use her loan to buy spun yarn and fleece.

Marina's goals for her business are to have her own premises which will give her financial stability.  Marina lives together with her husband and her two children who are 28 and 16 years old.  Her dreams on a personal level are to continue doing well in her business so that she can provide her family with better well-being and a better quality of life.

Marina's motivation to continue making her handicrafts is that she really enjoys what she does.  She is very happy and thankful for the services provided by Fondo Esperanza and, above all, for the good service and welcome.

As far as her community bank is concerned, she tells us that it has been a good experience for her and that the other entrepreneurs have been committed to both the group and each of their businesses.  The training sessions have helped her to run her business well.

Puerto Montt is a city in the south of Chile, in Los Lagos region.  Some of the city's attractions are its beautiful green landscapes, its quiet beaches, its cuisine, the reputation of its fish and seafood, and its handicrafts.  It is also an entry point to Isla Grande de Chiloé which is rich in tradition and legends.

loans.use: to buy spun yarn and fleece

loans.name: Orlith

texts.es: Orlith tiene 35 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su pareja y de sus dos hijos en su casa propia, que lo logró comprar con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza Orlith, es la venta de comida específicamente "Juane", platillo típico de la selva. Para ello se levanta muy de temprano para preparar éste platillo, contando con la ayuda de su pareja, quien luego llevará todo lo preparado a un mercado informal de su ciudad, donde se encuentra su puesto de venta. Tiene 8 años dedicándose a esta actividad, tiempo el cual le ha valido para hacerse conocida y tener una regular clientela. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es el poder contar con un ingreso económico propio que le permite apoyar en los gastos de su hogar a su pareja, así como en la educación de sus hijos. Considera rentable su negocio, porque su platillo es de consumo habitual además el rico sabor le ha dado bastante acogida, por ello espera mas adelante ampliar su negocio. Este sería el primer crédito con MFP, y se siente contenta por la oportunidad de contar con la ayuda de ustedes. Con el préstamo solicitado, comprará los ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de Juanes, como arroz, pollo, condimentos, huevos, aceitunas.
texts.en:
Orlith, 35 years old, is a happy woman and a hard worker. She lives together with her partner and their two sons in their own house, which they were able to purchase with great effort. Orlith's business involves selling food, and in particular "Juane", a dish local to the jungle. She gets up very early to prepare this dish, relying on help from her partner, who then takes all the prepared Juane to an informal city market, where she has her stall. She has been working at this for the last eight years, in which time she has become well-known and built up a regular clientele. 

What she likes about this work is having a dependable income that allows her it to help her partner with the household expenses, as well as their children's education. Her business is profitable, as Juane is an everyday dish and its delicious taste has made it very popular. She is therefore hoping to expand her business in the future.  

This will be her first loan from Kiva Field Partner, MFP, and she is glad to have the opportunity to count on your help. With the requested loan, she will buy the necessary ingredients for the preparation of Juanes, such as rice, chicken, spices, eggs and olives.

loans.use: to buy rice, chicken, spices, eggs and olives.

loans.name: Marin

texts.es:
Don Marín  vive en una localidad muy pequeña  en donde las personas todas trabajan en el campo  el  es casado con la señora  Mariana  y con quien procreo un hijo de la edad de un año y nueve meses.

    El solcito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra  de  fichas  para  teléfono ya que es lo  que más  le ha dado  resultado  y ha mejorado sus ingresos para ser puntual en los pagos que el toca en fundación.
  Quien lo inspiro a estas actividad  fue el solo, para apoyarse con los ingresos de la casa  y vivir más cómodos  como  familia.

   Lo  que más desea es que con esta actividad pueda seguir trabajando para  seguir aumentado sus ingresos  y  poder pagar lo  medicamentos de su pequeña.
texts.en:
Marin lives in a small town where everyone works in the field.  He is married to Mariana and they have a child of a year and nine months.

He requests a loan to invest in buying phone cards, which have given him the best results and improved his income so that he may be timely with his payment to the foundation.

He was inspired to do this job to support his home and live more comfortably as a family.

He hopes to continue working to increase his income and be able to pay the medical expenses of his little one.

loans.use: buy phone cards.

loans.name: Cleofacia

texts.es:
Doña Cleofacia  es ama de casa y vive en una localidad muy pequeña en donde celebran la fiesta del santo san Andrés, ella vive en unión libre con el señor Saúl y con quien procreo cuatro hijos que un siguen su responsabilidad.

    Ella solicito el préstamo par invirtió en la compra  y venta de becerros, en donde le está yendo bien ya que ha  visto  rendimientos en su negocio y así también  mejor ganancias.
  
   Quien lo  motivo  a esta actividad fue su esposo quien   es el que se encarga de comprar y luego vender los animales  mientras ella se dedica a su hogar y a sus hijos.

    Lo que desea es que con esta pequeña actividad pueda ir  aumentando sus ingresos  para   continuar trabajando con la compra y venta de ganados.
texts.en:
Cleofacia is a housewife who lives in a very small locality where they celebrate the Fiesta of Saint Andres. She lives in common law union with Saul with whom she procreated 4 children who are still their responsibility. 

Cleofacia is requesting a loan to invest in buying and selling young bulls. Things are going well since she has seen more money flowing into their business and also, better profits.

The one who motivated Cleofacia to enter this activity was her husband who is in charge of buying and selling the animals while she focuses on her home and children.

What Cleofacia desires is that with this small activity, her income will keep on increasing as she continues in the cattle buying and selling business.

loans.use: to buy young bulls to raise and sell.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
La señora María Magdalena  es casada con el señor Juan y con quien procreo  seis hijo  quienes todos están a su responsabilidad.

   Ella es ama de casa y solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra  y  venta de ganados en donde le va bien   ya que  avisto un buen resultado durante sus nueve meses que lleva trabajando.

    Quien lo motivo a esta actividad fue su  familia para  apoyar a su esposo con los ingreso de  la  casa y así tener une  vida más cómoda con sus hijos.

   Lo que desea y pide que la sigan apoyando  ya que su familia  es un poco grande y desea trabajar para darle lo más necesario.
texts.en:
María Magdalena is married with Juan and they have six children, all economically dependent on them.

She is a housewife, and she has requested a loan to buy livestock to then resell it. She is happy with her activity, as she has obtained good results in the nine months she has been engaged in it.

She started this activity for her family: she wanted to help her husband providing income for the household in order to offer a better standard of living to her children.

She wishes and asks to continue receiving support as her family is quite big and she wishes to work to provide them with the basic necessities.

loans.use: To buy livestock.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es:
La señora Aurelia vive en una localidad muy bonita, ella es casada con el señor sarain y  con quien procreo  tres hijos que a un están a su responsabilidad.

     Ella solcito el préstamo  para invertirlo en la compra  de  refrescos  y luego venderlo  al mayoreo en esta actividad viene  trabajando  hace cinco  años  y le va bien ya que con ellos ha visto un buen resultado para sus ingresos.

     Quien lo  motivo a esta actividad fue su familia   para sí apoyara su esposo con los  ingreso de la  casa  y la educación de su  hijos y no les falte lo más necesario.
 
   Lo  que más desea es que con esta pequeña actividad pueda ir mejorando día con día  su calidad de vida para que sus hijos tengan un mejor futuro  y logren salir adelante.
texts.en:
Aurelia lives in a very nice community. She is married with Sarain and they have three children economically dependent on them.

She requested a loan to buy soft drinks to then sell them at a wholesale price. She has been engaging in this activity for five years, and she is happy whit it as this has been good for her income.

Her family is the reason she engages in this activity: she wants to help her husband with the household earnings to contribute to the education of their children and to see their basic necessities are always taken care of.

Her biggest desire is that though her activity she can day by day improve her standard of living, so that her children can have a better future and succeed in getting on in life.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks.

loans.name: Rosanelia

texts.es:
La señora Rosanelia  vive en un una localidad lejana  y muy pequeña, ella es casada con el señor Víctor y con   quien procreo siete hijos que un  están a su responsabilidad.

        Ella solito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de  pollo de granja para luego venderlo  destazado,   en la misma localidad en esta actividad lleva  trabajando hace  un  año y le va muy bien  ya que ha logrado  mejorar sus ingresos para  sostener a su familia.

      Quien lo motivo esta a actividad fue su familia quien son su razón de buscar la manera  de trabajar  en algo que le deje ingresos para seguir  adelante con su pequeña familia.

      Lo que más desea es que con esta actividad  pueda seguir adelante  para seguir apoyando a sus hijos que están estudiando y logren ser algo en la vida.
texts.en:
Rosanelia lives in a very small and faraway community. She is married with Víctor, and they have seven children economically dependent on them.

She requested a loan to buy chickens to cut them up and then sell them in her community. She has been engaged in this activity for one year, and she is very happy with it as she has succeeded in increasing the income to support her family.

Her family is the reason why she has started her activity, as it is for them she has looked for a job that would give her money to provide for her small family.

Her biggest desire is to be able to carry on her activity in order to continue supporting her children, who are studying and whom she wants to be successful.

loans.use: To buy chickens to cut them up and then sell them.

loans.name: Maria Rosa

texts.es:
La señora María Rosa  vive en  una localidad en la que  las personas son de una religión y habían la lengua  zoque, vive en  unión libre con el señor pablo  y a su responsabilidad tiene  a dos hijos  pequeños de edad.
 
     Ella se dedica a  su hogar y su familia, en ello solito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de ganado  y luego venderlo, en esta actividad lleva practicando  un años ye le va bien ya que con ello  logarlo incrementar mas  sus ingresos.

    Quien lo motivo ha esta actividad fue sus esposo quien es el que se encarga  de compara y vender mientras ella se encarga  de la familia, aun así también  ella ayuda a embarcar  los animales cuando ya los vende.

    Lo que desea es que con esta actividad puede seguir trabajando para   así poder sacar adelante a su familia que es lo más importante para ella.
texts.en:
María Rosa lives in a town where the people are of one religion and one language called Zoque. She lives in partnership with Pablo and has two young children to care for. She is devoted to her home and family. 

She is asking for a loan in order to buy cattle for later resale. She has been in this field for one year and has been doing well and with the loan she could increase her income.

She is asking for this loan for her husband who is in charge of the buying and selling while she takes care of the family, even though she helps to load up the animals when they are sold. 

She hopes that with this activity she can continue working in order to move her family forward which is the most important thing for her.

loans.use: to buy cattle for later resale

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
La señoras Lidia vive en una ribera muy bonita en la que siempre se estas nublada, ella es casada don el señor Delfino y con quien procreo siete hijos de los cuales todos están casados.
 
     Ella es ama de casa y solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de  ingredientes como son:  queso, aceite, royal, huevo, entre otros para la elaboración de panes  en la que lleva trabajando hace  cuatro años y nueve meses y le va bien ya que ha logrado agrandar mas su horno para coser los panes.

      Desde muy joven su mama le enseño a elaborar panes y cuando se caso  dejo de practicarlo pero hace cuatro años de nuevo inicio con la misma actividad y le va bien ya que le ha dejado buenas ganancias en su hogar.

 Lo que más  desean es que con esta actividad ella  puede seguir trabajando  hasta que dios le preste vida y así seguir adelante.
texts.en:
Lidia lives in a very pretty community where it is always cloudy.  She is married to Delfino, with whom she had seven children, all of whom are married.

She is a housewife, and she requested the loan to invest it in buying ingredients such as cheese, oil, Royal yeast, and eggs, among others, to make bread.  She has been doing this work for four years and nine months, and it's going well for her since she already has managed to enlarge her bread oven.

Her mother taught her to make bread from a very young age, and when she got married she stopped doing it.  Four years ago, though, she started again with the same job and it's going well for her since she has produced good profits in her household.

What she most wants with this work is to be able to continue working and so continue getting ahead as long as God gives her life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make bread.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
Don Emilio  es casado con la señora  Berenice  y con quien procreo seis hijos que aun están a su responsabilidad y estudian.

    El oolito el préstamo par invertirlo ene la compra  de madera para elaborar muebles, como  son: roperos, estante, cillas, comedores, puertas, entre otros, en donde lleva trabajando  hace  once años y comentó que le va bien ya que ha logrado mejorar día con día sus ingresos.

     Quien lo motivo a esta actividad fue su padrino quien le enseño a como se elaboran este tipo de trabajos y le gusto y desde entonces lo viene practicando y si le da ingresos.
texts.en:
Emilio is married with Berenice and they have six children who are students and are economically dependent on them.

He has requested a loan to buy wood to create furnishing items such as wardrobes, bookcases, chairs, dining room sets and doors. He has been engaged in this activity for eleven years and he says he is happy with it as he has succeeded in increasing his income day by day.

He started his activity thanks to his godfather who taught him how to create this kind of products and, since he liked it, he decided to engaged in it in order to earn an income.

loans.use: To buy woods to create furnishing items.

loans.name: Maria Erica

texts.es:
La  señora María Erica  es de una Ribera muy bonita ella es casada con el señor Juvenal y con quien  procreo  seis hijos que  aun están a su responsabilidad.

     Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo  en fundación realidad y es para invertirlo en  la compra  ingredientes como  son: azúcar, queso, aceite, harina, royal, entre otros para la elaboración de panes, en donde lleva elaborando  cuatro años y le va bien ya que a logrado mejorar sus ingresos con su pequeña actividad.

    Quien el  motivo a dedicarse a esta actividad fue su mama ya que  desde muy pequeña inicio con apoyarla a vender pero cuando se caso dejo de elaborarlo y hace unos años comenzó de nuevo y le va bien.

   Lo que más desea es que con esta pequeña actividad ella pueda seguir adelante, trabajando con la elaboración de panes ahorrar para apoyar a sus hijos en la escuela.
texts.en:
María Érica is from a pretty riverside community. She is married to Juvenal, with whom she has six children that are still under their responsibility.
This is the first time she has requested a loan in the “Fundacion Realidad.” The loan is to invest in buying ingredients such as: sugar, cheese, oil, flour, baking powder, among others for the preparation of bread. She has been successfully making bread for 4 years, and she is improving her income with her small business.
Her mother motivated her to engage in this activity and she began to help her sell at a very young age, but stopped when she got married. A few ago, she began again, and she is doing well.
What she wants most is that with this small business she could continue forward and working with the production of bread to save to support her children in school.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make bread.

loans.name: Maria Aurora

texts.es:
Doña María Aurora  es casada con el señor  José Walter y con quien procreo  dos hijos que a un están a su responsabilidad  y vive en una comunidad en la que celebran la fiesta del santo san José en el mes de marzo.

 Ella solicito el préstamo para invertirlo  en la compra de  pollos  de granja para luego venderlo destazado en la misma localidad, en la que lleva trabajando  un año y ve  que le está yendo bien ya que ha tenido una mejor ganancia.
  
     Su inspiración por esta actividad fue  para ayudar a su esposo y así  juntos trabajar para sacar adelante  a sus dos pequeños que viene creciendo.

    Lo que más desea es que con esta actividad ella pueda seguir trabajando para seguir apoyando a su pequeña familia a salir adelante.
texts.en:
María Aurora is married to José Walter, with whom she had two children who are still her responsibility.  She lives in a community in which they celebrate the feast of San José [Saint Joseph] in the month of March.

She requested the loan to invest in buying farm poultry to later sell cut up in the same town.  She has been doing this work for a year and she sees that it's going well for her because she has had better profits.
  
Her inspiration for this work was to help her husband and so work together to get their two growing little ones ahead.

What she most desires is that with this work she can continue working to continue supporting her small family to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy chickens and later sell them in the same town.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La señora Lucila es casada  con el señor Jesús Mizrain y con quien procreo cinco hijos quiñes ya todos son dependientes de sí mismo, ella vive en un barrio pequeño en donde celebran la fiesta de trinidad.

    Ella solcito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de maíz  para tostarlo y venderlo en pinol, tascalate, y polvillo, en esta actividad lleva trabajando hace  un año y cuatro meses en la que le va bien ya que con ello ha logrado mejorar sus  ingresos.
 
   Quien la inspiro en esta actividad fue ella sola para apoyar a su esposo con los ingresos de la casa y así salir adelante.

   Lo que más desea es que con esta pequeña actividad ella valla mejorando cada día más su actividad y tener como sostenerse mas adelante.
texts.en: Lucila is married to Jesus Mizrain and together they have 5 children who are still dependent on them.  They live in a small neighborhood where the people celebrate the fiesta of the Trinity.  Lucila is requesting this loan to purchase corn, which she roasts, grinds and sells.  She's been working at this for almost a year and a half.  So far it's been going well and she's been able to increase her income.    This business was Lucila's idea, as she wanted to help her husband with their household costs, and help improve their quality of life.  What she wants most is to continue to grow this business each day, so that it can help sustain her in later years.

loans.use: to purchase corn than she roasts, grinds and sells.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys es  soltera tiene 26 años de edad y vive en un barrio muy bonito y trabaja con un hermano a vender ropas deportivas.

   Ella solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de cosméticos de la marca Avon, en donde lleva trabajando un año y un mes y cometa que le está dando buen resultado  en sus ingresos para apoyar a sus padres en la economía.
 
   Su inspiración por esta actividad comenzó por una compañera con la que estudiaban y la invito a vender cosméticos en la que se animo y le va bien, ya que aprovecha en el momento que llegan los clientes a hacer pedidos de uniformes.
.
   Lo que ella desea es que con esta pequeña actividad pueda mejorar cada día sus ingresos para seguir apoyando a sus papas con los ingresos, así también con el tiempo tener su propio negocio.
texts.en: Gladys is 26 years old and single.  She lives in a very beautiful neighborhood and works with her brother selling athletic clothing.   This loan is to purchase Avon cosmetics, which she has been selling for just over a year now.  The business is going well and she uses her income to help support her parents.  Gladys' inspiration for the business was a friend whom she studied with, who invited her to sell cosmetics.    She wants to take advantage of the timing as customers are coming now with requests.  Gladys hopes that every day she can increase her income, so that she can continue to help her parents.  In time she'd like to have her own business.

loans.use: to purchase Avon cosmetics to resell.

loans.name: Lorena Patricia

texts.es:
Lorena Patricia,  tiene 23caños de edad es soltera y estudia la universidad, vive con sus padres en un barrio pequeño y tiene dos hermanos.

   Ella solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de ropas para luego venderlo en su local que tiene rentado, en donde lleva trabajando hace cinco años  en la que comenzó apoyando a su mama y decidió independizarse  y comenta que le va bien.

   Quien lo inspiro en esta actividad fue su mama quien es la que le surte para que su negocio este siempre surtido y sus clientes encuentre lo que desean comprar.

    Esta contenta y agradecida con el préstamo ya que con ello podrá incrementar más su negocio que es con lo que se apoya para tener y pagar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Lorena Patricia, 23, is single and studies in the university.  She lives with her parents in a small neighborhood and has two siblings.

She requested the loan to invest in buying clothing to later sell in her place, which she rents.  She has been doing this work for five years.  She began helping her mother and decided to work independently, and she comments that it's going well for her.

What inspired her in this work was her mother, who is the one who supplies her so her business is always supplied and her customers find what they want to buy.

She is happy and grateful for the loan, since with it she will be able to increase her business, with which she supports herself and pays for her studies.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Maria Febe

texts.es:
L a señora María Febe traba de muestra en una comunidad muy pequeña ella es casada con el señor Samuel y con quien procreo dos  hijos que a un están a su responsabilidad.

   Ella solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la  compra de materiales como son: hilos, telas, entre otros para su taller de manualidades en donde elabora, servilletas, cojines, manteles, entre otros, en esta actividad lleva trabajando hace un año ya que sus niños son los que la apoyan a bordar y comenta que le va  bien.

   Quien la inspiro en esta actividad fue a una tía quien también se dedica  a lo mismo y ella le llamo la atención para trabajarlo con sus alumnos y sepan elaborar manualidades.
 
   Lo que ella dese a es que con esta actividad ella pueda mejorar  cada día su trabajo y sus alumnos también salgan adelante.
texts.en:
María Febe embroiders fabric in a small community. She is married to Samuel with whom she has two children who are in their care.  

She asks for a loan to invest in the purchase of materials like: thread, fabric, etc for her craft workshop where she embroiders napkins, cushions, tablecloths, etc. She has been doing this work for one year since her children help her work. She says things are going well. The person who inspired her work was her aunt who also worked in the same field. She was known for working with her students, and they knew how to embroider by hand. 

With this work she would like to get better every day and for her student to also move forward.

loans.use: to purchase materials to  make crafts.

loans.name: Omar

texts.es:
Omar tiene 20 años, es un joven emprendedor, dinámico y alegre. Es soltero, pero vive en casa de sus padres en compañía de uno de sus hermanos, su prima y una sobrina. El trabajo que realiza Omar es el alquiler de un equipo de sonido para la actividades sociales, siendo esta cada fin de semana. Tiene seis meses realizando esta actividad, lo que le ha permitido ser conocido. Paralelo a ello, también vende ropa masculina como polos, camisas y pantalones de buena calidad y que estén a la moda, mercadería que trae desde la ciudad de Lima, negocio que tiene un año y hasta el momento le ha ido bien y ya tiene diversos pedidos por la campaña navideña que se avecina. 
Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es el ingreso económico, con el cual puede apoyar en la economía de su hogar y pagar sus estudios, además de comprarse artículos personales. Desea seguir progresando y con esfuerzo lograr abrir una tienda de ropa. Este sería su primer crédito con MFP, se siente muy contento y agradecido por la oportunidad que le dan, asimismo se compromete en ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más ropa masculina para ello deberá viajar a Lima para comprar dicha mercadería.
texts.en:
Omar is 20 years old. He’s an enterprising, dynamic, and joyful young man. He is single, but he lives at home with his parents along with his siblings, his cousin, and a niece. 

Omar rents sound equipment for social occasions every weekend. He’s been doing this work for six months which has made him well-known. At the same time, he also sells high quality and stylish men’s clothing like polo shirts, shirts, and pants. He brings in this merchandise from Lima. He’s had this business for one year, and right now it’s going well. He already has several orders for the upcoming Christmas season. What he likes about his work is the income. With that he can help with the household finances, afford his schooling, and buy personal items. He would like to continue moving forward, and with hard work he will be able to open a clothing store. 

This will be his first loan with MFP. He’s very happy and thankful for the opportunity he’s been given. Also he is committed to making punctual payments. With the amount requested, he will buy more men’s clothing and to do that he will have to travel to Lima.

loans.use: to buy more men's clothing.

loans.name: Maria De Lourdes

texts.es:
A la vivienda de la señora Maria De Lourdes le está haciendo falta la barda al frente. 
Solicita un préstamo para comprar el materia que es (block, sementó, arena, varilla y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora).
 Doña Maria De Lourdes se dedica a la venta de ropa y juguetes, con las ganancias que recibe planea pagar el crédito, con el dinero que le envía su esposo pagara los gastos familiares y escolares de sus cuatro hijos que están estudiando.
Desea la seguridad y mejorar la calidad de vida y que el patrimonio que tiene este en buen en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
The front wall at Maria De Lourdes’ home is missing. She is asking for a loan to buy materials (blocks, cement, sand, and rods) and to pay the person who will make the improvements. 

Maria De Lourdes sells clothing and toys. She plans to repay the loan with her income. The money that her husband sends her will pay for the household bills and for the schooling of their four children. 

She would like the security, to have a better quality of life, and for the family home to be in good condition.

loans.use: to build a wall in the front of her home.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Víctor tiene 48 años, es un hombre muy trabajador y humilde. Vive en compañía de su pareja y su hijo en su casa que es propia. Se siente orgulloso por la hermosa familia que tiene y por ello desea luchar por salir adelante. La actividad que realiza, es la venta de chicharrones, platillo que consiste en chacho frito. Ella posee un puesto de venta en el mercado informal de su ciudad, por lo que es muy concurrida. Además la buena sazón con que prepara éste platillo le ha permitido ser el favorito entre la competencia. Tiene ocho años dedicándose a esta actividad, y en este tiempo tiene la ayuda de una joven a quien paga sus servicios. Lo que le gusta es poder tener un ingreso económico y así poder ayudar en los gastos de su hogar, por ello lo considera rentable, ya que está ubicado en una zona muy comercial y tiene bastantes clientes. Este seria el primer crédito con MFP, esta agradecido de poder contar con la ayuda de ustedes. Con el préstamo solicitado, comprará los insumos para prepara chicharrones, y así mejorar su negocio.
texts.en: Víctor is 48 years old and is a hardworking and humble man. He lives with his partner and child in his own house. He feels proud of the beautiful family her has and wants to fight for them to get ahead. He sells 'chicharones', a dish that consists of fried pork. He has a stall in the city's informal market which is very busy. He also makes it such a tasy dish that he has become the favourite among the competition. He has been doing this job for 8 years and has a young woman as a hired help. What he likes is having an income and thus being able to help with the household expenses which is why he considers the business profitable as he is located in a very commercial district and has enough customers. This would be his first loan with MFP. He is grateful to be able to count on your help. With the requested loan he wll buy consumables to make 'chicharones' and thus improve his business.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials with which to make more chicharones (a typical fried meat dish).

loans.name: Senda De Amor Group

texts.es: Maria Concepcion tiene 43 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijas y un hijo, reside en la Aldea San Nicolas, y es miembro y coordinadora del Banco Comunal Senda de Amor. Doña Maria inició vendiendo nacatamales y ropa de segunda mano, y desde hace unos años se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de rosquillas y quesadillas. Ella se levanta muy temprano por la mañana para iniciar su jornada laboral, dos de sus hijas le ayudan a mezclar todos los ingredientes mientras ella prepara el horno, y una vez que sale el producto horneado, una de sus hijas le ayuda a entregarlo. Por la venta de su producto obtiene una buena ganancia pero cuando llueve mucho le va mal porque la leña se moja y no le da buen punto al pan y este se pasa de tiempo. Ella aprendió a realizar su negocio porque observaba a otras personas hacerlo y tambien las ayudaba para agarrar practica. El prestamo que solicita lo necesita para comprar materia prima como harina, azucar, huevos, soda, leña, etc. Y con lo que venda ella podrá seguir sosteniendo a su familia y tambien podrá ahorrar un poco para responder ante cualquier emergencia. Su sueño es apoyar a sus hijas para que cada una de ellas tenga su propio negocio y puedan ganarse la vida honradamente. En la actualidad FAMA ha impartido a sus clientes cursos sobre Panaderia y Reposteria y Doña Maria asi como sus compañeras de grupo se han beneficiado, por tal razón ella iniciará a diversificar su negocio con productos como pasteles y otros tipos de panes.
texts.en: Maria Concepcion is 43 years old, is a single mother and has 3 daughters and 1 son. She lives in the village of San Nicolas and she is a member and the coordinator of the communal bank Senda de Amor. Doña Maria started off by selling tamales and used clothes and in recent years she has been making and selling doughnuts and cheesecake. She gets up very early in the morning to start her working day. Two of her daughters help her mix all the ingredients while she prepapres the oven. Once the product leaves the oven, a daughter helps her deliver it.  She makes a good profit selling her product but when it rains heavily it goes badly for her as the firewood gets wet and it is difficult to get the right temperature for the bread at the right time. She learned her business by watching others do it and she also helped them to gain experince. She needs the loan requested to buy raw materials such as flour, sugar, eggs, baking soda, firewood, etc. With the sale she will be able to continue taking care of her family and will also be able to save a little to use in an emergency. Her dream is to help her daughters to each have her own business and have an honourable way of making a living. Currently FAMA has given courses on Breadmaking and Pastry Making and Doña Maria and the members of her group have benefitted from them. For this reason she is thinking of diversifying her business with products such as pastries and types of bread.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, eggs, firewood, etc.

loans.name: Kati

texts.es: Kati tiene 33 años, es una mujer alegre y dinámica. Vive en compañía de su esposo y de sus dos hijos que aún son menores de edad y por ellos es que desea luchar y dar una mejor calidad de vida. La actividad que realiza es la venta de comida, en un puesto ubicado en una aserradero de madera. Pues ahí da pensión a los trabajadores de esa empresa. En esta actividad cuenta con el apoyo de una tía, su sobrina y una chica que esta contratada como ayudante de cocina y por tal a todos ellos son remunerados mensualmente. Tiene cuatro años dedicándose a esta actividad y en todo este tiempo el negocio le ha permitido tener un ingreso económico, que le facilita poder solventar los gastos de su hogar, con ello apoya a su esposo en la economía. Considera rentable su negocio, y cada vez son más los clientes que tiene, por ello desea renovar sus cubiertos y utensilios de trabajo. Este seria el crédito número ocho con MFP, se siente muy cómoda con el grupo que conforma pues los considera personas responsables. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de utensilios, mesas, platos, vasos.
texts.en: Kati is 33 years old and is a very happy and dynamic woman. She lives with her husband and two children, who are underage, and because of them she wishes to fight to give them a better quality of life. Kati sells food and feeds the workers of a sawmill where she has a foodstall. In her business, she has the support of her aunt, niece and a girl that she hired as a cook; each is paid monthly. Kati has worked in this field for four years and it has allowed her to have an income that helps her and her husband meet the household expenses. She considers her business to be profitable as each time she has more customers and now wishes to restock her business by buying eating utensils and work tools. This will be her eight loan with MFP and is very comfortable with her group since she considers them to be responsible people. With the money she will buy eating utensils, tables, plates and cups.

loans.use: buy eating utensils, tables, plates and cups.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es: Eva, de 47 años, es una mujer alegre y amable con deseos de superación. Vive en compañía de su pareja y de sus dos hijos en su casa que es propia. La actividad que realiza, consiste en la compra y venta de granos como el maíz , para lo cual se levanta muy temprano y se dirige a los campos de los mismos productores, en donde compra a precios más cómodo estos productos. Luego son almacenados en su casa, que posteriormente pasa por un proceso de molido para ofrecerlo al público. Tiene 15 años dedicándose a esta actividad, tiempo que le ha servido para ser conocida en el rubro. Lo que le gusta de éste trabajo es que le permite tener un ingreso económico que le ha valido para pagar sus gastos, y mantener a su familia. Este sería el crédito número doce con MFP, comenta que se siente muy agradecida por el apoyo de la institución, ya que en todo este tiempo que viene trabajando ha logrado crecer su negocio y quiere poder seguir contando con esta ayuda. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la ampliación de su local para poder almacenar mayor cantidad de productos.
texts.en: Eva is 47 years old and is a very happy and kind person with wishes to get ahead in life. She lives with her partner and two children in her own home. She works selling and buying grains like corn, and gets up very early, goes to fields and buys her items at the best price. The grains are later stored in her home and are passed through the grind to be sold. Eva has worked in this field for 15 years and it has made her well known by her peers. What Eva enjoys about her work is being able to have an income that allows her to pay her expenses and support her family. This will be her twelfth loan with MFP and says that she is very grateful for the support given to her by the institution since she has been able to make her business grow and wants to continue to be able to count with their help. With the loan, she will expand her stand to store a greater quantity of products.

loans.use: expand her stand to have more space to store her grains.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: La distinguida Sra. Panchita como le dicen sus clientes y amigos, es una persona muy trabajadora  con su familia ya que desde hace tiempo se dedica a la venta de quesos, vende ropa nueva y hace un año abrió su forrajera ubicada en las las orillas de la carretera de  la ciudad,  ella  nos comenta  que  tiene un gran  numero de clientes de los ranchos cercanos a los cuales los   abastece de  alimento para caballos y vacas, como ella y su familia les gusta el campo y los animales esta  muy contenta  de  dedicarse  a  esto,  están agradecidos  por  el  apoyo  brindado para la realización de  su proyecto,  el cual  consiste  en realizar   la  compra  de mercancía para  la  forrajera , para  continuar  ofertando a sus  clientes  el excelente  servicio que  los  caracteriza.
texts.en: The distinguished Mrs. Panchita ('Panchita' is a nickname for Francisca), as she is known by her customers and friends, is a very hardworking person since for a longtime she has sold cheese and new clothing. A year ago she opened her own feed store that is located near the highway to the city. Mrs. Panchita tells us that she sells feed for horses and cattle and has many customers in the nearby ranches. Since Mrs. Panchita and her family enjoy the countryside and animals, she is very happy to have this job and is grateful for the support given to her to continue her business, buying fodder, and offering her excellent customer service that she is so well known for.

loans.use: buy feed.

loans.name: Crispiniana  Group

texts.en:
Crispiniana is married and has five children. She is 56 years old and lives in Carangan, Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines.

Crispiniana sells assorted dry goods to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for 3,000 to purchase more stocks  for her general store .

Crispiniana has been a member of PMPC for four years.  In the future, she hopes to be more successful in her business. Crispiniana is the leader of a two person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks for her general store.

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is married and has 5 children. she is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Conchita is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. She has been farming for 20 years. She has requested a loan of 11,000 to purchase fertilizer for rice. 
Conchita has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, she hopes to see her children finish college.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for rice.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is 59 years old and lives in Buenavista, Oroquieta City. She is married and has 6 children. 

Adelaida has a sari-sari store business and earns approximately PHP 2,000 each month doing this type of work. She has a requested a loan of 10,000 to purchase more stocks for her general store. Adelaida has been a member of PMPC for 3 years.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks for her general store.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is 43 years old and lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has 1 child. 

To earn a living, Jennifer has a business selling different meats. She earns about PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. Jennifer has requested a loan to purchase spices and meat.

Jennifer has been a member of PMPC for 7 years.  In the future, Jennifer would like to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase spices and meat.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
As a married mother of six children, Marites works hard to support her family.

She has a fish selling business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling food. Marites is borrowing PHP 11000 through NWTF to buy fish to sell in her food stall.

Marites has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Marieta

texts.en:
Marieta is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish selling business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy fish to sell in her food stall. Marieta has been in this business for 10 years. She earns more income from buying and selling gasoline.

Marieta has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Josefa, 57, is a widow with five children.

Josefa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Josefa has borrowed and repaid twelve loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for twenty years and also earns an income from food vending.

Josefa aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 42 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has four children. 

Evangeline is a farmer and raises pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for four years. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase additional pigs to raise. 

She has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Evangeline hopes to see her children finish college.

loans.use: to purchase additional pigs to raise.

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita, 47, is married and has five children, one of whom is in school.  She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Esterlita has a fish selling business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her fish stall.

Esterlita has been in this business for twenty years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her fish stall.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 51 years old and has two children.  Erlinda is married and both her children are in school.

Erlinda is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Erlinda requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Erlinda has been raising pigs for seven years now and has borrowed eleven times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Erlinda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 58 years old and married with eleven children.  With two of those children in school, Rosalinda works very hard to provide for them.

Rosalinda runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Rosalinda has been in this business for ten years and sells a variety of items such as retail items. 

Rosalinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is married with three children.  Teresita is 49 years old and lives in Fatima, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Teresita sells silver jewelry to earn a living and has had this business for one year.  Each month, she earns PHP 10,000 doing this type of work.  She has requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to purchase more silver jewelry for her business.

Teresita has been a member of PMPC for more than one year.  In the future, Teresita hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more silver jewelry for her business.

loans.name: Florita

texts.en:
Florita is separated from her husband.  She is 57 years old and blessed with five grown-up children.  She lives in Macabayao, Jimenez Misamis Occidental.  

Florita operates her own garden in their barangay to make a living and has had this business for more than three years.  Each month she earns PHP 1,500 doing this type of work.  She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase more fertilizers and seedlings. 

Florita has been a member GDMPC for almost one year.  

Florita's business is going much better because her income has increased a lot due to the fact that now she can earn more money from the sale of her vegetables. Her dream is to plant in greater quality.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seedlings.

loans.name: Johna

texts.en:
Johna is married with two children.  Johna is 58 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Johna is a farmer and raises pigs to earn a living.  She has been doing this for six years.  She has requested a loan of PHP 7,000 to purchase feed for the pigs. 

Johna has been a member of PMPC for seven years.  In the future, Johna hopes to save money for emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase feed for the pigs.

loans.name: Everlita

texts.en:
Everlita is single.  Everlita is 55 years old and lives in Comunal, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.
 
Everlita sells Fern-C vitamins to earn a living and has had this business for ten years.  Each month, she earns PHP 10,000 doing this type of work.  She has requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to purchase new stocks of herbal medicine capsule.

Everlita has become a member of PMPC this year, 2011.  In the future, Everlita hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase new stocks of herbal medicine capsules.

loans.name: Mayenn

texts.en:
Mayenn is single with one child.  Mayenn is 29 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Mayenn is a farmer and raises pigs to earn a living.  She has been doing this for a year.  She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase feed for the pigs. 

Mayenn has been a member of PMPC for a year. In the future, Mayenn hopes to send her child to school.

loans.use: to purchase feed for the pigs.

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is 53 years old and lives in Ibabao, Aloran, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is married/single and has no children. 

Conchita has a fish vending business and earns approximately PHP 6,000 each month doing this type of work. She has a requested a loan  of 25,000 to purchase more fish to sell. 

Conchita has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Conchita hopes to have a fishing boat and wants to improve their lives.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is married with seven children. She is 44 years old and lives in Sto. Niño, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.

Helen sells food for snacks to earn a living; she has had this business for two years. She has requested a loan for 5000 PHP to purchase raw ingredients for her food vending business.

Helen has been a member of PMPC for more than one year. In the future, Helen hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her food vending business.

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina is 70 years old and lives in Dela Paz, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has six children. 

To earn a living, Rufina has a business selling nutritious snacks. She earns about PHP 5,000.00 each month doing this type of work. Rufina has requested a loan to purchase flour and other ingredients for her snack business.

Rufina has been a member of PMPC for seven years.  In the future, Rufina would like to have a refreshment stall in town.

loans.use: to purchase flour and other ingredients for her snack business.

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita is married with four children. She is 60 years old and lives in Gil Sanchez, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte.

Clarita sells food for snacks to earn a living; she has had this business for 11 years. She has requested a loan for 2000 PHP to purchase ingredients for her snack vending business.

Clarita became a member of PMPC this year. In the future, Clarita hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her snack vending business.

location.town: Gil Sanchez, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for the pigs.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 44 years old and lives in Lopoc, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with four children.

Editha works in the fishing industry, catching and selling fish for a living. She has been doing this for four years. She has requested a loan of 7000 PHP to purchase materials for her fishing boat.

Editha has been a member of PMPC for more than a year. In the future, Editha hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her fishing boat.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is 55 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 

Fe has a pigpen that sells matured and grown pigs. She has had this business for ten years. She has requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy feed for the pigs.

Fe is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, Fe hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy animal feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 47 years old and lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She is married with one child.
 
To earn a living, Evelyn has a business selling fruit salad. She earns about PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. Evelyn has requested a loan of 40,000 to purchase more fruit for her fruit salad business.

Evelyn has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, Evelyn would like to expand the business.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with eight children. 

Vilma has a duckpond and she sells duck eggs. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy animal feed for the ducks.

Vilma is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, Vilma hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy feed for the ducks

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 45 years old and lives in Lower Lamac, Oroquieta City. She is married with two children. 

Marcelina has a general store business and earns approximately PHP 1,200 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase more stock for her retail store.
 
Marcelina has been a member of PMPC for seven years.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her retail store

loans.name: Marisa

texts.en: Marisa, a 35-year-old married mother of one living in Bintangan, Larena, Siquijor, has been raising pigs to earn a living for the past eight months. A member of the Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for a year, she is now requesting a loan of 8,000 pesos to buy feeds and medicines for her pigs.  In the future, Marisa hopes to be able to save for her child's future education.

loans.use: To buy feeds and medicines for  her piggery business.

loans.name: Lanie

texts.en:
Lanie is 22 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child. 

Lanie has a shop that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan for PHP 15,000 to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Lanie has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Lanie hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en:
Ailyn is 48 years old and lives in Taboc Norte, Oroquieta City. She is married with three children. 

Ailyn has a fish vending business and earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase more fish to sell. 

Ailyn has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, Ailyn hopes to have a fishing boat.

Ailyn is a MIGS member of PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Munkhbaatar

texts.en:
Mr. Munkhbaatar, 45, is a transportation driver for a private company. He started his job this year in this company but has been working for many years as a driver. Munkhbaatar lives with his son and wife in a ger, the nomadic Mongolian traditional tent, in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

Last fall, he started building his own house beside his ger but could not finish it due to a lack of money, especially to purchase the necessary building materials to complete the house. He wants to finish it before this winter. Now he just needs to complete some parts of it such as windows, doors and wall insulation. Therefore, he will use his loan to purchase the building materials necessary for his new house. After the building is completed, he is planning to run a grocery store on the first floor of his house.

loans.use: To purchase materials to build his house

loans.name: Jhonny

texts.en:
From the village of Disimuray, Cauayan City, Isabela, Jhonny is 34 years old, married, and the father of three children, two of whom are currently in school. To make a living, Jhonny manages his farm business, usually planting and harvesting corn for sale. Engaged in this business for 12 years, he earns approximately 25,000 PHP every crop season.

Jhonny is now requesting a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase seedlings and fertilizers. He hopes to increase his net income so he can continue sending his children to school and improving his family's living situation.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings and fertilizers.

loans.name: Batkhurel

texts.en: Mr. BatK. is 22 years old and lives with his wife and two children in a ger, or traditional Mongolian tent in Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. Since 2008, he has earned a living by driving a taxi, but his vehicle is in poor condition and limits his ability to earn enough money to support his family. He is applying for this loan to repair his taxi so that he can earn additional income.

loans.use: to increase his income by repairing his taxi.

loans.name: Rosel

texts.en: For the last four years, Rosel has earned a living by selling fruits and vegetables to the people of her village from 8 a.m.-6 p.m. She usually earns about PHP 4,000 a month and uses this income to provide for the needs of her five children, all of whom are in school. She would like to diversify her business and is applying for a loan for PHP 10,000 to buy bananas, mangoes, tomatoes and cabbage to sell to her customers. Her goal is to earn enough money to send all of her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fruit to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Ammie

texts.en: Ammie is 38 years old, married and has three grown children. For the last 10 years, she and her husband have run a motorcycle transport service where they earned enough money to send all of their children to school. Her children all now have good jobs and are occasionally able to help their parents. Ammie is applying for a loan for PHP 27,000 to improve her motorcycle by buying new tires, mirrors and paint.  Her goal is to become financially independent by increasing her income.

loans.use: to buy tires, mirrors and paint for her motorcycle.

loans.name: Ligaya

texts.en: Ligaya is 56 years old, married and has three grown children. For the last four years, she has earned a living by selling food and items people need daily such as soap, shampoo and toothpaste. She earns about PHP 3,000 a month and is applying for a loan for PHP 10,000 to buy more items to sell to her customers. Her goal for the future is to become financially independent and have enough money to take care of herself in her old age.

loans.use: to buy eggs, bread and soft drinks to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Bernardita

texts.en: Bernardita is 50 years old and lives in the Philippines with her husband and four children. For the last 10 years, she has earned a living by raising pigs. She is applying for a loan for PHP 29,000 to buy feed for her livestock. She joined HSPFI earlier this year as a way to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds for her livestock.

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
Judy works hard to earn a living. He is 41 years old, married and has two children.

Judy has managed his corn field business for almost 20 years. He said that the main source of income for his family comes primarily from his farming business. He would like to support his family's needs (most especially for his two students) but due to the high cost of commodities, he suffered from a shortage of funds. In this regard, he is asking for additional capital in the amount of 27,000 PHP to buy farm supplies and for payment of labor costs for those who plow and plant his corn field. In this way, he could improve his corn field and make it more productive.

He hopes that his income will increase, allowing him to send his children into higher levels of education and improve their living condition.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and for payment of labor costs for those who plow and plant his corn field

loans.name: Melecia

texts.en:
Melecia is 56 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children.

Melecia has a pigpen that sells matured and grown pigs. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 29,000 PHP to buy animal feed for the pigs.

Melecia has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Melecia hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy animal feed for the pigs

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is a responsible housewife who engages herself in fruit and vegetable vending in their community. She is 47 years old and has three school-age children. With her husband, it is their ambition to improve their living status and give their family a better life. Farming is the main sources of their living. They plant vegetables and fruits and raise livestock for sale. They endure the problems and difficulties they've encountered in life for they believe that it is their stepping stone to reach their goals.

Delia aims to continue and improve her small business and she wants to ask for additional capital of 5,000 PHP to buy apples, grapes, melons, oranges, cabbages, tomatoes, beans and bananas to sell. She mentioned that this loan will be a great help to be able to make the business grow and is hoping that she will be successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy apples, grapes, melons, oranges, cabbages, tomatoes, beans and bananas to sell

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is married with one child. Wilma is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Wilma is a farmer and grows pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years. She has requested a loan to purchase feed and vitamins for pigs.

Wilma has been a member of PMPC for 11 years.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for pigs

loans.name: Roberto

texts.en:
Roberto is 51 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 6 children.

Roberto has a pigpen and sells matured and grown pigs. He has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan for 15,000 PHP to buy animal feed for the pigs.

Roberto has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Roberto hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy animal feed for the pigs

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn, a married mother of 17 children, is 48 years old and a resident of Tukuran Zamboanga Del Sur. Merlyn, a hardworking, responsible woman who found herself needing to sell seafood to help her husband support the household, has been selling fish for more than five years. She goes out every morning at 5 a.m. to buy fresh product directly from the fishermen and then resells it in her local market or door-to-door in neighborhoods near the market. Preferred by customers because of the quality of her products, she earns about Php 4,600.00 each month.

A member of GDMPC for more than 3 years, Merlyn is now requesting a loan of PHP 5,000.00 to buy more fish to sell in the market. The profits arising from the loan will go toward the education of her children and to sustain the daily needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Sambuudorj

texts.en:
Sambuudorj is 59 years old and is a widow who has 3 daughters and 2 sons ages 19 to 29. They live in a ger (a traditional Mongolian felt tent) which is located in the outer ger district (a district without basic infrastructure) in Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia. She is a retired clerk. Her elder two daughters work as an accountant and a guide, her elder son works as a teacher, and her youngest daughter and son attend a local university. 

They live all together in a small ger, but they have managed to build a new house which will be finished very soon. To solve a very essential problem – a heating system - they need much money, so Sambuudorj is requesting a 2,000,000 MNT (Mongolian tugriks) loan to solve her problem in order to set up a heating system. “After finishing our housing project, we will live happy and safe all together,” Sambuudorj said.

loans.use: to set up a heating system

loans.name: Zilpha

texts.en:
Zilpha is 57 years old and lives in Dela Paz, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 7 children.

Zilpha has a merchandising business and earns approximately 10,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 5,000 to  purchase more stock for her general store.

Zilpha has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Zelpha hopes to open another branch of her merchandising business in Jimenez.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.en:
Bernardo is from the village of Pinto Alfonso Lista, Ifugao. He is 52 years of age, married and has four children.

To earn a living, Bernardo plants corn and harvests it for sale. He has been managing his corn field business for almost 20 years. Now he would like to avail himself of a loan amounting to 27,000 PHP, allowing him to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer, certified seeds and insecticides to improve his farming business.

According to Bernardo, he needs to increase his profit because he spends much at this time due to daily household expenses and the tuition fees of his children. He hopes that he could continue to support his children until they finish their studies. One thing he is hoping is that all Kiva lenders will continue to assist him financially so that he could improve his business and provide the basic necessities for his family.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer, certified seeds and insecticides to improve his farming business

loans.name: Apolinario

texts.en:
Apolinario is divorced with one child. He is 49 years old and resides in Tabo-o, Misamis Occidental. The loan he acquired in his first cycle of loans at GDMPC was of great help to his family. He was able to get "ani" (yield) of about 5 bags of rice. He was very happy and he was able to return the money loaned for his farm. 

Apolinario also has another line of business aside from farming as he is also a fisherman. Apolinario owns and operates a business in the food sector selling his own caught fish in his neighborhood to earn a living.

He has been in this business for more than five years. Each month, he earns 2,200 PHP doing this type of activity. He requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy new materials for fishing like nets. Apolinario has been a member of GDMPC for almost a year. In the future, Apolinario plans that he will buy a pump boat for fishing.

loans.use: to buy new materials for fishing like nets
