With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Josephat and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from his maize sales, Josephat will rent another shamba (land used for growing crops) for more production and invest in livestock.

In 2012, the members of Vumilia SHG group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

He is pictured in the photograph with his group members.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Tembwa Environmental Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Tembwa Environmental Group in Western Kenya! It's headed by Micah as the facilitator of the group. Some members of this group are very experienced One Acre Fund farmers, who joined the program two seasons ago.  

Micah is a father of two children. He joined One Acre Fund in order to grow enough to feed his family and have additional maize profits to educate his children. In the recent 2011 season, Micah had a good maize yield harvesting seven bags on 1/2 acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Micah was only able to harvest five bags of maize on 1/2 acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Micah and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from maize sales, Micah will buy a new cow.

In 2012, the members of Tembwa Environmental group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

He is pictured with his group members in the photograph above.

loans.use: To source farming inputs such as seeds and fertilizer at low prices for the 2012 planting season

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en: Mohamad is a 27-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents and one sibling. His income is very important as he is a big support for his father. He works as a freelance plumber, specializing in installing toilets, faucets, etc. He has been involved in this occupation for the past 4 years. Today, he’s asking to borrow $1000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to invest in purchasing materials for his projects. This may include pipes, bathroom fixtures, etc. In the future, he plans to work on bigger projects.

loans.use: buy plumbing materials

loans.name: Sasagara Group

texts.fr:
Rosette est une commerçante âgée de 35ans qui habite la localité de Mumuri de la Province de Gitega au centre du pays. Elle fait le commerce de produits alimentaires (farine de manioc et poissons secs appelés «  ndagala ») depuis 3 ans. Elle est aussi cultivatrice. Elle a fait ses études jusqu’en 6e année primaire. Elle est mariée et Sylvestre et mère de 4 enfants dont 2étudient a l’école primaire. 
 Le crédit Kiva  de 100,000 francs burundais qu’elle obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter de grandes quantités de produits alimentaires (farine de manioc et ndagala)  à revendre  afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices pour pouvoir subvenir a ses multiples besoins. 

Elle est membre  du groupe  communautaire« Sasagara»
texts.en: Rosette is a 35-year-old merchant who lives in the town of Mumuri, in Gitega Province, in the middle of the country. For three years, she has been doing commerce in grocery items (cassava flour and a dried fish called ndagala). She is also a farmer. Rosette attended school and reached the 6th grade. She is married to Sylvestre and is the mother of four children. Two of the children are in primary school. The Kiva loan of 100,000 Burundi francs that Rosette obtained has enabled her to increase her capital to buy large amounts of grocery items (cassava flour and ndagala) to resell in order to make a large profit. Thus, she can meet her many needs. She is a member of the community group "Sasagara".

loans.use: to increase her capital to buy a large amount of grocery items (cassava flour and ndagala) to resell in order to make a large profit

loans.name: Tambuka Group

texts.fr:
Odette est une commerçante âgée de 32ans qui habite la localité de Mumuri de la Province de Gitega au centre du pays. Elle fait le commerce de bananes depuis 3 ans. Elle est aussi cultivatrice. Elle a fait ses études jusqu’en 9e année secondaire. Elle est mariée a Faustin et ont ensemble 5 enfants dont 3étudient a l’école primaire. 
 Le crédit Kiva  de 100,000 francs burundais qu’elle obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter de grandes quantités de bananes à revendre  afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices et accroitre ses économies. 

Elle est membre  du groupe  communautaire« Tambuka»
texts.en:
Odette is a 32-year-old merchant who lives in the town of Mumuri in Gitega Province, in the middle of the country. She has been doing commerce in bananas for three year. She is also a farmer. 

Odette has attended school and reached the 9th grade. She is married to Faustin. Together they have five children, of whom three are in primary school. 

The Kiva loan of 100,000 Burundi francs that she obtained has enabled her to increase her capital to buy large amounts of bananas to resell, so as to make a large profit and to increase her savings. 

She is a member of the community group "Tambuka".

loans.use: to increase her capital to buy large amounts of bananas to resell in order to make a large profit

loans.name: Webanania Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Webanania S.H.G Group in Western Kenya! Sophia is the facilitator of Webanania S.H.G group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Sophia takes care of five children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Sophia had an excellent maize yield harvesting 20 bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Sophia was only able to harvest eight bags of maize on one acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Sophia and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Sophia will educate her children, ensure food security and invest in livestock.

In 2012, the members of Webanania S.H.G group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Tujijure I Group

texts.fr:
Sylvestre est un commerçant âgé de 50ans qui habite la localité de Rutoki de la Province de Gitega au centre du pays. Il fait le commerce de bière locale de bananes et du sorgho il ya de cela 25 ans. Il faisait le commerce d’articles divers de boutique avant de commencer cette activité. Il a fait ses études jusqu'en 6e année primaire. Il est marie a Mélanie et ont ensemble 8 enfants dont 5 sont a l’école. 
 Le crédit Kiva  de 440,000 francs burundais qu’il obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter de grandes quantités de bière locale à revendre  afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices et accroitre ses économies pour subvenir a ses besoins essentiels en l’occurrence les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. 

Il est membre  du groupe  communautaire« Tujijure I»
texts.en:
Sylvestre is a 50-year-old merchant who lives in the town of Rutoki in Gitega Province, in the middle of the country. He has been doing commerce in local beer, bananas, and sorghum for 25 years now. He used to deal in store goods before beginning this current business. 

Sylvestre has attended school and reached the 6th grade. He is married to Mélanie, and together they have eight children. Five of the children are in school. 

The Kiva loan of 440,000 Burundi francs that he obtained has enabled him to increase his capital to buy large amounts of local beer to resell, so as to make a large profit and to increase his savings. Thus, he can cover his essential expenses, in this case, the  costs of his children's schooling.

loans.use: to increase his capital to buy large amounts of local beer to resell in order to make a large profit

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase mechanical parts and materials.

loans.name: Majambere Group

texts.fr:
Libère est un commerçant âgé de 34ans qui habite la localité de Giheta de la Province de Gitega au centre du pays. Il fait le commerce de produits alimentaires (huile et poissons secs appelés « ndagala ») depuis 7 ans. Il est aussi cultivateur. Il a fait ses études jusqu'en 6e année primaire. Il est marie a Médiatrice et ont ensemble 3 enfants qui n’ont pas encore commence l’école. 
 Le crédit Kiva  de 250,000 francs burundais qu’il obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter de grandes quantités de produits alimentaires (huile et ndagala) à revendre  afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices et accroitre ses économies. 

Il est membre  du groupe  communautaire« Majambere»
texts.en: Libère is a 34 year old business man who lives in Giheta in the provide of Gitega in the center of Burundi. He has been involved in the buying and selling of food products (oil and dried fish named "ndagala") for the past 7 years, as well as farming. He attend school for six years, until the end of primary school. He is married to Médiatrice and together they have three children who have not yet begun to attend school. He is asking for a loan for 250,000 Burundian francs will allow him to increase his capital in order to purchase large quantities of food products in order to increase his sales. He is a member of the community group "Majambere" and can be seen raising his hand in the photo.

loans.use: increase capital to purchase large quantities of food products (oil and dried fish) for re-sale

loans.name: Twizerimana Group

texts.fr:
Virginie est une commerçante âgée de 46ans qui habite au Quartier de Nyabututsi  de la Ville  de Gitega au centre du pays. Elle fait le commerce de bière industrielle depuis 7 ans. Elle est aussi enseignante. Elle a fait ses études jusqu'à l’obtention du Diplôme des Humanités pédagogiques. Elle est mariée a Louis et ont ensemble 8 enfants dont 7étudient. 
 Le crédit Kiva  de 300,000 francs burundais qu’elle obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter de grandes quantités de bière industrielle à revendre  afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices et accroitre ses économies. 

Elle est membre  du groupe  communautaire« Twizerimana»
texts.en:
Virginie, age 46, is a merchant who lives in the Nyabututsi neighborhood, in Gitega (center of the country). She's been selling industrial beer for seven years. She's also a teacher.

She pursued her studies until she obtained the "Diplôme des Humanités pédagogiques". She's married to Louis, and together they have eight children, out of whom seven attend school.

She's seeking a loan of BIF 300'000 (ca US$ 235) from Kiva, which will enable her to bolster her working capital to buy large quantities of industrial beer to resell, and increase her profits and savings.

Virginie is a member of Twizerimana Group.

loans.use: to buy large quantities of industrial beer

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en: Lucy, a married woman blessed with one child, describes herself as a hardworking business woman. Operating a grocery business to support her family, since joining Faulu Kenya she has learnt how save her money, and hopes to grow her business in the future. Lucy has requested a loan of 10,000 Kenya shillings to buy potatoes, tomatoes and fruits for resale.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, tomatoes and fruits.

loans.name: Inmaculada Concepcion De Yungaqui Ii Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “INMACULADA CONCEPCION D. YUNGAQUI II”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Anta, perteneciente a la provincia D. Anta y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Felicitas; ella es casada y tiene 41 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio D. agricultura, ella se dedica al negocio D. compra y venta D. ganado y también es propietaria D. un terreno D. cultivo donD. siembra maíz,papa,quinua y zanahorias, ella tanto los ganados como los productos lo venD. en las diferentes ferias que existe en el distrito D. Anta, la socia trabaja desD. las 5:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio D. estos negocios la socia quiere salir adelante, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio D. agricultura y negocio D. compra y venta D. ganados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ganado y para comprar semillas y fertilizantes para el terreno D. cultivo.
 
Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio D. crianza D. cuyes, negocio D. venta D. productos lacteos, negocio D. tienda D. abarrotes, negocio D. venta D. maíz, negocio D. venta D. leña y negocio D. venta D. animales.

Los dos socios que estan adjuntos a la foto grupal se les entrevisto despues porque tenian permiso por motivo D. trabajo.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the Inmaculada Concepción D. Yungaqui II communal bank, located in the district of Anta, in the province of Anta and department of Cusco.

The member is Felicitas.  She is 41 years old and married with two children.  She works in agriculture; she has a business buying and selling livestock and she also has plot of land where she grows corn, potatoes, quinoa, and carrots.  She sells both the livestock and the crops in different markets in the district of Anta.  She works from 5:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.

Felicitas wants to get ahead with these businesses.  She wants to expand and improve her farming business and her business buying and selling livestock.

Felicitas is requesting the loan to buy livestock and to buy seeds and fertilizer for her land.
 
The other members work raising guinea pigs, selling dairy products, running a grocery store, selling corn, selling firewood, and selling animals.

The two members who are attached to the group photo were interviewed later because they had permission because of work.

Felicitas is grateful to everyone who is part of this dream by way of this loan, and she is committed to making her payments by the established deadline.

loans.use: to buy livestock and to buy seeds and fertilizer for her land.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline, 29, married and blessed with five children, is a hardworking business woman who has been running a beauty salon for the last four years to support her family. She has been able to develop her business because of the good reputation she enjoys with her customers.

Caroline, who has requested a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to buy hair braids, shampoo and a blow dryer, wants to expand her business in the next five years.

loans.use: to buy hair braids, shampoo and a blow dryer.

loans.name: Maria Anita

texts.es: La Sra. María es una persona muy trabajadora  y   responsable ella comenta que se entero del apoyo  brindado para la realización de  los  proyectos   gracias  a  una  amiga la  cual  acudió con nosotros , es  por  ello que  se acerco con nosotros  para realizar  el proyecto que  trae  en mente el cual  es comprar un  porton  para  el  frente  de su  vivienda, ya que  como  trabaja  la mayor  parte  del  día tiene  miedo  de  que los ladrones  entren a su  domicilio, ve  en el  crédito la posibilidad de brindar a  su  hogar   seguridad  además  de  que  su   vivienda  tendrá  una mejor imagen.
texts.en: María is a very hardworking, responsible person.  She comments that she found out about the support available to carry out projects thanks to a girlfriend who had turned to us.  Because of this, she called on us to carry out the project she has in mind to buy a gate for the front of her house because since she works most of the day she fears that thieves will enter her house.  For her, the loan means the possibility of providing more security for her home and also that her house will have a better appearance.

loans.use: to buy a gate.

loans.name: Sofah

texts.en:
Sofah is 23 years old and single. He has been running a retail shop for the last three years to make a living. Previously, he managed a grocery business. Sofah has been able to retain his business because of his good reputation with his customers. 

Sofah is requesting for a loan for 30,000 Kenya shillings to buy a weighing machine and a refrigerator. In the next five years, he wants to establish a wholesale business. Sofah has become more business oriented through the trainings conducted by Faulu Kenya on business management.

loans.use: to purchase a weighing machine and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Anjela

texts.en: Anjela is married and blessed with one child, who is in school. She has been running a beauty salon for the last twelve years to support her family. She also sells charcoal to supplement her income. She has employed one person to assist her with managing the business. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to access loans to boost her business. Anjela has requested a loan of 50,000 Kenyan shillings to buy hair braids and hair chemicals.

loans.use: To buy hair braids and hair chemicals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy three doors for three rooms in her house.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es: Trinidad. de 52 años de edad y tiene 2 hijos.ella se dedica a la venta de frutas,desde 2 años y le da gracias a Dios por el apoyo brindado ya que sus ventas han mejotado y han aumentado,ahora ella nos esta solicitando este credito para la compra de frutas,ya que la demanda de sus clientes es mucha y nececita mas capital para trabajar,y asi de la misma manera seguir ayudando a su familia y darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en: Trinidad, 52, has two children.  She has sold fruit for two years and she thanks God for the help she’s gotten for her sales have been improving and increasing.  Now, she’s asking us for this loan to buy fruit because customer demand is high and she needs more capital to work and to continue helping her family and to provide a better future for her children.

loans.use: to buy fruit at wholesale.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, tiene la edad  de  52 años, vive con su esposa y  una hija actualmente que son su prioridad. El con el crédito quiere comprar los insumos y la semilla para sembrar frijol. El cuenta con un lote actualmente desocupado y es de optimas condiciones para la agricultura por lo cual quiere realizar esta siembra. El quiere darle un buen uso al terreno y ponerlo a cosechar en las mejores condiciones posibles para así obtener el máximo de producción del frijol sembrado. El pretende con el crédito generar una excelente asistencia a la siembra y así obtener una gran cosecha generando el máximo de ganancias económicas para el bienestar de su familia y su estabilidad económica.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Jorge, 52, lives with his wife and a daughter who are his priority.  He wants to use the loan to buy farm supplies and seeds to plant beans.  He has a fallow field that’s in optimum condition for farming and this is why he wants to plant.  He wants to put the field to good use and start it producing in the best possible conditions so that he will obtain the best possible bean harvest.  He plans to use the loan to provide excellent assistance to the crop so that the maximum possible profits will be generated from it for his family’s wellbeing and economic stability. This is his first FUDECOSUR loan. He’s had no previous loans with state banks and FUDECOSUR gave him the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Martha Santos

texts.es: Martha. de 35 años de edad y tiene 5 hijos,ella se dedica a la compra y venta de banano por mayor,desde hace 10 años en el marcado de su comunidad,le da gracias a Dio porque le a ayudado en su negocio y con la ayuda de el ahora sus hijos tambien venden chocobananos y distribuyen en tres escuelas,doña Martha esta solicitando este credito para la compra de banano y asi venderlos a un buen precio,ya que esta conciente de que le falta capital para trabajar  asi seguir con su negocio.el sueño de ella es que sus hijos tengan su propio negocio y asi superarse poco a poco.
texts.en: Martha, 35, has five children.  She buys bananas at wholesale to resell in her local market; she’s been in business ten years.  She thanks God because He has helped her in her business and with His help her children now also sell ‘chocobananos’ [chocolate covered bananas] at good prices because she’s aware that she lacks working capital to continue with her business. Her dream is that her children have their own businesses to get ahead little by little.

loans.use: to buy bananas at wholesale for subsequent resale.

loans.name: Juboo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Juboo a été crée depuis le 10/octobre 2010 il est composé de 11 membres issus du meme groupement et habitant le meme village. 

Madame Waly Tew est la responsable de ce groupe elle est marié et mère d un enfant .Elle s active dans le petit commerce plus précisément dans la vente de tissu de produits détergents et comme activité secondaire elle fait de l'embouche porcine.Elle est debout sur la droite de la photo habillé en vêtement rose.

Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans son domaine d'activité.

Avec ses bénéfices elle compte acheter des habits pour son enfant et payer des médicaments pour ce dernier en cas de maladie.
texts.en:
Juboo Group was established on October 10, 2010. It is made up of 11 members coming from the same group and living in the same village.

Mrs. Waly Tew is responsible for the group. She's the one standing on the right in the photograph, wearing a pink outfit.

She's married and the mother of one child. Her business consists in selling fabrics and detergents. As a secondary business, she also raises pigs. 

She has a good experience in her field of activity. With her profits, she intends to buy clothes for her child, as well as medication in case of sickness.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, detergents, and pigs

loans.name: Sopey Mohamed Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est 27 août 2009, il est constitué de neuf de femmes qui habitent le même quartier et une parfaite entente règne entre elles.

La responsable madame Katy est âgée de 40 ans, mariée elle est mère de deux enfants, et a un autre en charge; elle mène une activité de commerce d'habits et parfums. Elle a une bonne expérience de plus de deux ans.Elle est debout à droite sur la photo habillée en corsage blanc et pagne noir.

Elle s'approvisionne  dans la capitale et revend dans les quartiers de la ville.

Elle souhaite avec son prêt acheter des habits, parfums en grande quantité afin de se faire plus de revenus à la vente.

Elle compte avec ses bénéfices aider son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille et augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
SOPEY MOHAMED Group was established on August 27, 2009. It is made up of nine women who live in the same neighborhood, and who get along very well.

Mrs. Katy, age 40, is responsible for the group. She's the one standing on the right in the photograph, wearing a white top. She's married and the mother of two children, and has another one to support.

For more than two years, she's been selling clothes and perfumes, and has a good experience in this business.

She gets her supplies in the capital, and resell in the neighborhoods of the town.

She would like to use her loan to buy clothes and perfumes in large quantities, in order to increase her profits on sales.

She intends to use her profits to help her husband in taking care of the family, and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy clothes and perfumes

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: increase capital in order to purchase more products for resale

loans.name: Lidia Elizabeth

texts.es: Lidia Elizabeth,de 42 años de edad y tiene 4 hijos ella se dedica a la confeccion de prendas de vestir.desde hace 5 años.ella nos cuenta que su esposo la apoya tabien sus hijos,ya que pues tienen barias metas que cumplir una de ellas es ser grandes confeccionistas y vender trajes por mayo,ahora ella nos esta solicitando este credito para la compra de telas para la confeccion de prendas de vestir,y asi de la misma manera seguir ayudando a sus familia.
texts.en: Lidia Elizabeth, 42, has four children.  She’s a seamstress; she makes articles of clothing.  She’s been in business for five years.  She tells us that her husband and her children support her efforts since they have several goals to meet one of which is becoming great clothes manufacturers and to sell suits at wholesale.  Now, she’s asking for this loan to buy fabric to make clothing and to continue helping her family.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es: Olga, tiene la edad  de 29  años, está casada y vive con su esposo y una hija actualmente que son su prioridad. Ella con el crédito pretende o quiere comprar terneros para engordarlos. Ella cuenta con los potreros en óptimas condiciones para la explotación de este nuevo proyecto y darle la mejor asistencia para su engorde excelentes condiciones. Ella a trabajado desde varios años atrás en este proyecto y conoce sobre el manejo de esto por lo cual invertirá. Ella pretende con esta inversión generar la máxima de las ganancias y engordar de forma optima sus terneros para la posterior venta en el mercado de la localidad. Ella cree que con la venta de estos animales le quedara dinero para mejorar su bienestar familiar y salir con los pagos del crédito y a la vez mejorar su capacidad económica.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Olga, 29, is married living with her husband and a daughter at present that are her priority.  She intend or wants to use the loan to buy calves to fatten up. She has pastureland that is in optimal condition to be used for this new project and to allow her to fatten them up in excellent conditions. She has worked in this type of project for several years now and knows what has to be done to manage it so that’s why she will invest in it.  She expects the investment will generate maximum profits and will fatten up the calves in the best possible way for future sale in the local market.  She believes that with the sale of these animals there will be money left to improve her family’s wellbeing and to repay the loan while improving her economic capacity.  This is her first FUDECOSUR loan.  She’s had no previous loans in state banks and FUDECOSUR gave her the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy livestock to raise.

loans.name: Roger

texts.es:
Roger, tiene la edad  de 25  años, está en unión libre y vive con su esposa  e hija  que son su prioridad. El con el crédito va comprar los insumos para la asistencia y la semilla de frijol para sembrarla. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación de este cultivo además de varios años de experiencia y conocimiento sobre los métodos de producción del Frijol. El quiere sembrar un terreno que reúne las condiciones favorables de explotación y asistir la siembra de la mejor manera para obtener un muy buen resultado de esta. El tiene como meta generar el máximo de producción de frijol para la venta y generar bastantes ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia al igual que su nivel económico de viviencia. 

Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Roger, aged 25, is in a common-law marriage.  He lives with his wife and daughter, who are his priority in life.  

With the loan, he will purchase supplies to help him with his farming and seeds for planting.  He has a piece of land that is suitable for this type of crop, and several years of experience and knowledge about production methods for beans.  He wants to plant some land that has favorable conditions for cultivation, and to improve the way he does his growing so as to get very good results. 

His goal is to produce as many beans as possible to sell and generate sufficient income to improve his family's quality of life and their financial standard.  

This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't taken other loans previously from the state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him a loan with better terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to plant and cultivate beans.

loans.name: Hitam

texts.en:
Hitam has a jewelry store she has managed for the past two years. Originally, Hitam opened her business in her home but this past year she moved to a central, busy location of her city in the Negev. This move has significantly increased her potential customer base. Hitam now wants to expand her business and include additional items such as perfumes and gifts.

She needs this loan for the expansion, to purchase stock and alterations to her store.

In the future Hitam wants to be able to offer her products and items in other localities, not just at her store.

loans.use: to purchase stock and make alterations to her store.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan, tiene la edad  de 58  años, está casado y vive con su esposa  e hijo  que son su prioridad. El con el crédito va comprar los insumos para la asistencia y la semilla para sembrarla. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación de este cultivo además de varios años de experiencia en el manejo de maíz. El quiere sembrar un área establecida de condiciones favorables para el buen desempeño de la plantación, y además tener los insumos necesarios para su buena fertilización y mejorar del cultivo. El con esta siembra pretende generar el máximo de ganancias para mejorar su nivel de vida y su bienestar familiar. También piensa con la ganancias generadas saldrá con los pagos establecidos del crédito. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Juan, 58, is married and lives with his wife and a son who are his priority.  He will use the loan to buy farm supplies and seed.  He has a plot of land that’s suitable for this crop and he also has several years’ experience growing corn.  He wants to plant in a settled area with favorable growing conditions for this crop and also to have the necessary supplies on hand for fertilizing and improving the crop.  He expects to generate the maximum profits possible with the crop to improve his standard of living and his family’s wellbeing.  He also believes that profits generated will allow him to repay the loan.  This is his first Fudecosur loan.  He’s had no previous loans with state banks and Fudecosur gave him the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Duo Nuevos Horizontes Group

texts.es:
Duo Nuevos Horizontes.
Este grupo esta formado por dos personas las cuales luchan dia,a dia para salir adelante.Doña Ana Marina, quien es la lider D. este duo se dedica a la confeccion D. tejidos,desD. hace años pero tambien en sus ratos libres se dedica a la crianza, D. animales como pollos,ella esta contenta porque siente que se pe pueD. dar ese apoyo que ella nececita para salir adelante en su negocio,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. materia prima para la confeccion D. tejidos,al igual que el señor Leonzo el se dedica a la crianza D. animales como pollos,y tambien esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. mas animales y agrandar su venta.
texts.en:
The "Duo Nuevos Horizontes" ("New Horizons Duo") group was formed by two people who strive on a daily basis to move ahead in life.

Doña Ana Marina, who is the leader of this pair, has been working doing weaving for the last several years.  In her spare time, she also works raising animals such as chickens.  She is happy, because she feels that she can use this help that she needs to advance her business.  She is requesting this loan for the purchase of raw materials for her weaving.

The loan will also be used for Señor Leonzo who works raising animals like chickens.  He is requesting this loan for the purchase of more animals to increase his sales.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for weaving.

loans.name: Higidia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LOS COMERCIANTES”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Higidia;  La socia tiene 45 años de edad, la socia es soltera, la socia tiene 5 hijos; de los cuales solo está con ella 1 de 7 años de edad, la socia se dedica a la venta de comida, ella prepara diversos potajes para la venta, la socia trabaja en las noches en la municipalidad en el área de guardianía, la socia por las mañanas realiza sus compras y prepara los diferentes potajes caseros para la venta, la socia tiene su kiosko en el mercado central del poblado y desea poder terminar de construirlo para que pueda atender a sus clientes, la socia también desearía comprar mesas, cubiertos para implementar su kiosko. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mesas, cubiertos, y terminar de construir su kiosko y poder recibir a sus clientes.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Higidia, 45, belongs to the “Los Comerciantes” (The Merchants) communal bank located in Andahuaylillas District in Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.  She’s single and has five children but only a 7-year-old is still living with her.  She sells food.  She prepares various dishes to sell and also works nights for the city as a custodian.  

In the morning she makes her purchases and prepares the various home-cooked dishes to sell.  She has a kiosk in her town’s central market that she’d like to finish building so that she can start to take care of customers.  She also wants to buy tables and place settings to equip her kiosk.  She is asking for the loan to buy tables, place settings and to finish building her kiosk and be able to receive customers.  She is grateful for the loan and commits to make her installment payment according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy tables, place settings and to finish building her kiosk.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LOS COMERCIANTES”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Victoria;  La socia tiene 74 años de edad, la socia es soltera, la socia tiene 3 hijos; de los cuales solo está con ella 1 de 35 años de edad, la socia se dedica a la ganadería como principal actividad y también ella compra y vende forraje como alfa alfa, y cebada; La socia compra 1 topo de alfa alfa y cebada, la socia lo que compra lo vende en tercios, ella reparte a diferentes clientes y también vende leche que sus vacas producen, la socia esta siempre viendo la manera de ingeniarse para tener ingresos por lo que nunca esta sin hacer nada, ella también en otras épocas compra verduras y las reparte a los mercados, la socia en esta ocasión desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de alfa alfa y cebadas por topos.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the ”LOS COMERCIANTES” communal bank.  The communal bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas, in the province of Quispicanchis and department of Cusco.

This member is Señora Victoria.  She is 74 years old and is single.  She has three children; the only one who lives with her is 35 years old.  The member works with livestock as her primary economic activity, and she also buys and sells animal fodder such as alfalfa and barley.  She buys alfalfa and barley in bulk, and divides it in thirds to sell to different customers.  She also sells milk produced by her cows.

The member is always looking to devise ways to earn income, and so is never without something to do.  In other seasons, she also purchases vegetables and sells them in the markets.

On this occasion, the member wants to invest her loan in purchasing alfalfa and barley in bulk.

The member is grateful for the loan, and agrees to comply with her repayments according to the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase alfalfa and barley in bulk.

loans.name: Fidencio Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Fidencio es un hombre que  decidió iniciar un negocio propio debido a que se quedo sin empleo por un largo periodo, gracias  a  su iniciativa  y perseverancia  de  salir  adelante  día  con día  el empezó a   realizar la venta de galletas y dulces al mayoreo , ofreciendo  sus productos  en  los  micronegocios  de la  localidad,  gracias  a esto   su negocio a  ido creciendo  y  nos  comenta  que   ya  adquirió   un carro en  el  cual  distribuye  sus  productos no solo en la   ciudad  si  no que  también  realiza   la  venta  en ciudades  cercanas,   debido  al aumento  de sus clientes  en este momento  necesita realizar  la compra de  mercancía   es  por ello  que acudió con nosotros para la realización de sus  proyecto.
texts.en: Fidencio is a man who decided to start his own business because he was unemployed for a long period of time.  Thanks to his initiative and perseverance to get ahead every day he started selling cookies and candy at wholesale offering his products to local micro businesses.  Thanks to this his business has been growing and he comments that he has acquired a car that he uses to distribute his products not only in the city but in nearby cities too.  Due to the increase in customers he needs to buy merchandise and this is why he called on us to carry out his project.

loans.use: to buy cookies and candy to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes at wholesale to resell.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LOS COMERCIANTES”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Rosario;  La socia tiene 30 años de edad, la socia es soltera, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 12, 8, 4 años de edad, la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de pasto en sus tiempos libres pero también la socia es trabaja prestando sus servicios del hogar como limpieza, arreglo, cuidado de menores como empleada del hogar; la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de pasto al por mayor para vender gradualmente. La socia desea ahorrar para poder poner un negocio propio al cabo de unos meses. 
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Rosario, 30, belongs to the “Los Comerciantes” (The Merchants) communal bank located in Andahuaylillas District in Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.  She’s single and has three children who are 12, 8 and 4 years old.  She is a fodder merchant but in her free time she also provides housekeeping services as a domestic employee like cleaning, straightening up and babysitting.  She wants to use the loan to buy fodder at wholesale to resell gradually.  She wants to save up so that she can open her own business in a few months.  She is grateful for the loan and commits to follow the installment payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy fodder at wholesale.

loans.name: Jijuka Group

texts.fr:
Laurent est un commerçant âgé de 63ans qui habite la localité de Gitongo de la Province de Gitega au centre du pays. Il fait le commerce du lait depuis 6 ans. Il commence ce métier après avoir termine son emploi avec l’ONG Solidarité. Il fait ses études jusqu’en 6e année primaire. Son épouse est une cultivatrice et tous leurs enfants sont déjà maries.
 Le crédit Kiva  de 290,000 francs burundais qu’il obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter de grandes quantités de lait à revendre  afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices et accroitre ses économies. 

Il est membre  du groupe  communautaire« Jijuka»
texts.en:
Laurent, age 63, is a merchant who lives in Gitongo, Gitega Province, in the center of the country. He's been selling milk for six years. He started this business after finishing his job with NGO Solidarité.

He attended elementary school up to the sixth year. His wife is a cultivator, and all their children are already married.

He's seeking a loan of BIF 290'000 (ca US$ 230) from Kiva, to bolster his working capital in order to buy large quantities of milk to resell, and increase his profits and savings.

He's a member of Jijuka Group.

loans.use: to buy large quantities of milk

loans.name: Mukenyeziterimbere Group

texts.fr:
Thomas est un commerçant âgé de 43ans qui habite la localité de Bukirasazi de la Province de Gitega au centre du pays. Il vend du the et du pain depuis 22 ans. Il commence ce métier alors qu’il fait le commerce de restaurant. Il a fait juste l’alphabétisation des adultes comme formation jusqu’en 2e année. Son épouse, Leoncie est une cultivatrice et 8 enfants dont 5 sont à l’école.
 Le crédit Kiva  de 290,000 francs burundais qu’il obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter de grandes quantités de the et de pains  à revendre  afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices et accroitre ses économies. 

Il est membre  du groupe  communautaire« MukenyeziTerimbere"
texts.en:
Thomas is 43-year-old merchant who lives in the town of Bukirasazi, in the province of Gitega, a central region. He is a member of the MukenyeziTerimbere community group. He has been selling tea and bread for 22 years, and started this activity while working in the restaurant business. He attended two years of adult literacy training. His wife Leoncie is a farmer. They have eight children, five of whom go to school. 

He is seeking a loan of 290,000 Burundi francs to increase his working capital. He will buy large quantities of tea and bread to sell in order to make substantial profits and increase his savings.

loans.use: to stock up on tea and bread for resale

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana Maria es una emprendedora que disfruta de esta actividad,  ella se dedica a brindar el servicio de costura.  Al verse en esta situación ella se vio en la necesidad de buscar un sustento para su familia. Ella comienza su negocio desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche en donde la mayoría de sus clientes conocen la buena calidad de prendas que elabora. Actualmente Ana necesita un préstamo para comprar hilos, tela, dedales, tijeras, cintas y bordados.
texts.en: Ana Maria is an entrepreneur who benefits from her work. She offers a sewing service because she needed to find a way to support her family. She works from 7:00 am to 9:00 pm. Ana Maria's customers recognize the high quality of the garments that she makes. Ana now needs a loan to purchase thread, fabric, thimbles, scissors, tape, and embroidery.

loans.use: to buy thread, fabric, thimbles, scissors, tape and embroidery.

loans.name: Juana Bertha

texts.es: Juana Bertha es una mujer emprendedora quien desde hace 5 años. Se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general como  ropa, accesorios y artículos para el hogar.  Su negocio lo inicio como una fuente de trabajo para ayudar en los gastos de su vivienda, sin embargo no cuenta con el monto de dinero necesario para hacer estas compras. El crédito es para la compra de pantalones, faldas, ropa interior, reloj, calzado, cosméticos.
texts.en:
Juana Bertha is an enterprising woman.   For five years she has been selling merchandise such as clothing, accessories, and articles for the home.

She started her business as a source of work to help with her household expenses. However, she doesn't have the money needed to purchase these goods. The loan is to buy pants, skirts, underwear, watches, footwear and cosmetics.

loans.use: To buy pants, skirts, underwear, watches, footwear, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal ”LOS COMERCIANTES”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Jose Luis;  El socio tiene 34 años de edad, El socio es conviviente, El socio  tiene 2 hijos de 4, 3 años de edad, El socio se dedica al trabajo en el área de técnico electricista, el socio tiene su trabajo estable y desea invertir el crédito en la salud de su mamá, el socio requiere hacerle chequeos a sus mamá y para ello desea el crédito.
El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Jose Luis belongs to the "Los Comerciantes" communal bank, located in Andahuaylillas district, in Quispicanchis province, Cusco department.  He is 34, and lives with his partner. He has two children, ages three and four.  

He works as an electrician. He has a steady job, and wants to pay for his mother's healthcare. He needs to arrange for her to have some medical tests. He is grateful for the loan, and is committed to making his scheduled payments on time.

loans.use: To pay for healthcare for his mother, and arrange for her to have some medical tests.

loans.name: G.s. Manos Unidas Group

texts.es: La señora Flor de Maria se dedica es la venta de nacatamales y cosas de horno. Ella es casada con dos hijos de 4 y 9 años respectivamente. Considera su mayor problema han sido las enfermedades de sus hijos de enfermedades respiratorias. Desea en un futuro criar cerdos para vender carne y seguir con los nacatamales, por lo que desea invertir en la compra de un lote de cerdos. La señora Maria del Rosario es nueva integrante del grupo, ella tiene 48 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos de 12, 16 y 22 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras de manera ambulante desde hace 5 años. Ella desea con el crédito comprar cosechas de naranjas y mandarinas, para sacarlas al mercado y comercializarlas.
texts.en:
Flor de Maria sells nacatamales (Nicaraguan steamed corncakes) and baked goods.   She is married and has two children, ages four and nine. She considers that her biggest problem has been her children's respiratory illnesses. In the future he wants to raise pigs and sell the meat, and continue with the nacatamales. So she wishes to buy some pigs.

María del Rosario is a new group member. She is 48, married, and has three children, ages 12, 16 and 22. She has been selling fruits and vegetables in the street for five years. She wants the loan to buy oranges and mandarins to sell in the market.

loans.use: To buy oranges and mandarins.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy clothing at wholesale to sell in his business.

loans.name: Heresvita Aide

texts.es: La. Sra. Heresvita es una persona  trabajadora  y  muy  responsable la  cual  se  dedica  a la  venta  de  ropa  usada y de  esta  manera    a logrado salir adelante  día  con día,  ella  acudió  con  nosotros  ya  que  desea  realizar  la compra  de mercancía  de  la  temporada  de  invierno,  ve  en  el crédito la  posibilidad  de   hacer  crecer   su  negocio  generando   un mayor   numero de ingresos  que  le permitirán  brindar  a  su  familia   una   estabilidad económica, agradece   el  apoyo  brindado  para  la realización de   su  proyecto.
texts.en: Señora Heresvita is a hard-working and very responsible person, who works selling second-hand clothing.  In this way she has been able to move herself ahead in life on a daily basis.  She came to us as she wants to purchase winter clothing.  In this loan, she sees the possibility of growing her business and generating more income.  This will allow her to provide her family with economic stability, thanks to the loan being provided to realize her plan.

loans.use: to buy winter clothing for resale.

loans.name: Ana Patricia

texts.es:
Ana es una joven de 25 años de edad, casada y madre de un hijo de 9,meses, y muy contenta con esta bendicion de su primer hijo, su oficio biblotecaria, hoy en dia vive junto  a sus suegros, pero con cuarto aparte el cual ha venido mejorando, su esposo labora como gestor aduanero.
Ana, en el futuro desea tener su propia propiedad, que de a su familia seguridad, lo que espera alcanzar. Este es su segundo credito, en donde con el primero logro, repellar las paredes de su cuarto, y ahora podra construir bien el baño y comprar inodoro para obtener una mejor higiene.
texts.en:
Ana is a young woman, aged 25.  She is married and the mother of an 9 month old son.  She is very happy with this blessing of her first child and her profession as a librarian.

Currently she lives with her in-laws, but has a separate space to which she has been able to make improvements.  Her husband works as a customs officer.

In the future, Ana wants to have her own property to give her family security.  She hopes to be able to achieve this.  

This is her second loan; with the first, she was able to plaster the walls of her space, and now she will be able to build a bathroom and purchase a toilet for better hygiene conditions.

loans.use: to build a bathroom and purchase a toilet for the area in the rear of her accommodation, to achieve better hygiene conditions.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: Maria Magdalena de 44 años. Desde hace 6 años se dedica a una pulpería, ella es una mujer muy emprendedora a sus clientes les gusta conversar con ella pues además siempre brinda buenos consejos. Maria es una mujer feliz, con fondos propios se esforzó por tener su propio negocio que le generara ganancias para su hogar. En la actualidad está solicitando un crédito para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, pastas, huevos, papel higiénico, jabón y sopas especialmente quiere surtirse muy bien.
texts.en:
Maria Magdalena is 44. She has had a small general store for six years. She is a very enterprising woman, and her customers like to talk with her, as she always offers them good advice. María is a happy woman. With her own funds, she made the effort to start her own business, in order to generate earnings for her household. 

At this time, she is applying for the loan to buy candy, soft drinks, pasta, eggs, toilet paper, soap, and soups, as she especially wants her store to be well-stocked.

loans.use: To buy candy, soft drinks, pasta, eggs, toilet paper, soap and soups.

loans.name: Yaquelin

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LOS COMERCIANTES”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Yaquelin;  La socia tiene 21 años de edad, la socia es soltera, la socia está esperando a  su primer hijo, ella está embarazada y la socia trabaja en la municipalidad en el área de informática, la socia también tiene como segunda actividad y de manera de apoyo la crianza de gallinas, la socia las compra tiernas las cria y las vende a un buen precio por unidad, por el momento la socia desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de ropones y accesorios para su bebe, la socia quiere invertir en la compra de ropones, cuna, accesorios para su bebe. 
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Yaquelin belongs to the "Los Comerciantes" communal bank, located in Andahuaylillas district, in Quispicanchis province, Cusco department.

She is 21, single, and expecting her first child. She is pregnant, and works in the town hall in the computer department.  She has a second livelihood raising chickens. She buys them young, then raises and sells them at a good price by the unit.  

At this time, she wants the loan in order to buy clothes and accessories for her baby. She wants to buy baby clothes and accessories and a cradle.  She is grateful for the loan, and is committed to making her scheduled payments on time.

loans.use: To buy baby clothes and accessories and a cradle for her baby.

loans.name: Abadahemana Group

texts.fr:
Tharcisse est un commerçant âgé de 40ans qui habite la localité de Nyamugari de la Province de Gitega au centre du pays. Il fait le commerce de souliers usagers depuis 23 ans. Il commence ce métier des sa sortie d’école qu’il a fait jusqu’en 6e année primaire. Il est marie a Gloriose et ont ensemble 5enfants qui sont tous a l’école.
 Le crédit Kiva  de 400,000 francs burundais qu’il obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter beaucoup de souliers usagers (de seconde main) à revendre  afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices et accroitre ses économies. 

Il est membre  du groupe  communautaire« Abadahemana»
texts.en:
Tharcisse is a 40-year-old storekeeper who lives in Nyamugari, in the province of Gitega in the center of the country. He has been selling used shoes for 23 years. He started the business when he left school after 6 years of schooling. He is married to Gloriose and they have five children together who are all in school.
The Kiva loan of 400,000 francs will help him to increase his capital to purchase a large quantity of used shoes (secondhand) in order to resell them at a high return and to increase his savings. 

He is a member of the community group, "Abadahemana."

loans.use: to increase the group's capital to purchase a large quantity of used shoes (secondhand) in order to resell them at a high return

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es:
Maria, sigue invirtiendo en su negocio, anteriormente, solo se dedicaba al destace de cerdo, lo que ha diversificado al  hacer comida como: baho, sopa y venta de fritanga, con el objetivo de poder obtener mejores ventas.
Y seguir con el apoyo  a la familia, con el credito anterior, logro aumentar la venta de carne de cerdo al invertir su capital en la copra de tres cerdo.
 Hoy con este nuevo prestamo es para cerrar bien su casa, en la parte del caballete de la pared, el cual cerrara con zinc liso, que es para ese tipo de trabajo, lo que no entrara mas polvo, como le ha venido afectando,  asi como hacer loceta de sumidero que esta en mal estado, y es peligro. Comprara materiales para comezar la obra.
texts.en:
Maria is continuing to invest in her business. Beforehand she only concentrated on her pig business, but now she has diversified into making food such as baho (local dish of beef, fried plantains etc.)  soup, and fritanga (grilled meat and fried intestines) so she can earn more money and continue supporting her family.

With her last loan she managed to increase sales of pork and bought three more pigs.

Now Maria is seeking a new loan to seal the top part of the walls of her house with flat zinc which is used for this kind of work. Then dust wouldn’t be able to get into the house and bother her. Also the drains are in poor condition and dangerous. She would like to buy material to begin this work also.

loans.use: to seal the gap between the walls and roof of her house and to buy material to improve the drains

loans.name: Ana Lisseth

texts.es: Ana Liseth tiene 23 años, su actividad es el destace de cerdos. Hace más de 4 años. Inicio trabajando con su Mama quien también se dedica al mismo negocio, pues debido a su situación económica se vio obligada a generar ingresos para las necesidades de su familia, sin embargo no cuenta con el monto de dinero necesario para hacer la compra de los cerdos, es por tal motivo que hoy solicita un préstamo que le permita comprar cerdos.
texts.en: Ana Liseth is 23 years old.  For more than four years her job has been butchering pigs.  She began working with her mother, who also works in the same business, since her economic situation obliged her to generate income for her family's needs.  Nevertheless, she doesn't have the necessary amount of money to buy the pigs.  This is why she is now requesting a loan that will allow her to buy pigs.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LOS COMERCIANTES”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Vilma;  La socia tiene 22 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 2 hijos de 4 y 2 años de edad; la socia vende chicha y animales menores la socia compra pollos por docenas, la socia se dedica  a la compra y venta de pollos por docenas, la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de alimentos para su pollos y en la compra de pollos por docenas para criarlos y para la venta.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Los Comerciantes communal bank, located in the district of Andahuaylillas in the province of Quispicanchis and department of Cusco.

Vilma is the member.  She is 22 years old and lives with her partner and two children, ages 4 and 2.  She sells "chicha" [a drink made from corn] and small animals.  She buys chickens by the dozen and works buying and selling chickens by the dozen.

She wants to use the loan to buy feed for her chickens and chickens by the dozen to raise and sell.

Vilma is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments in accordance with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy feed for her chickens and to buy chickens by the dozen to raise and sell.

loans.name: Patricia Angelica

texts.es: Patricia Ángelica es una mujer consagrada a su familia, por lo que trabaja con gran dedicación, vende ropa usada se siente afortunada por tener y un trabajo en el cual puede estar al frente de su hogar y manejar sus propios horarios. Con la ilusión de tener un progreso continuo Patricia quiere comprar mercancía al por mayor para generar más utilidades e insumos como pantalones, vestidos, trajes y faldas ya que tiene ciertos pedidos de clientes con tallas grandes. Es por eso que solicita un crédito para invertirle a su microempresa.
texts.en: Patricia Ángelica is a woman who is devoted to her family and so she works with great dedication.  She sells used clothing and feels fortunate to have a job in which she can lead her household and manage her own hours.  With the hope of making continual progress, Patricia would like to buy merchandise wholesale in order to make more profits.  She will buy supplies such as pants, dresses, suits and skirts as she has some large orders from her customers.  She is requesting a loan to invest in her micro-business.

loans.use: to buy pants, dresses, suits and skirts

loans.name: Hector Diobaldo

texts.es:
el sr. Hector Diobaldo tiene 40 años de edad, vive en unión libre y es padre de 3 hijos, Hector se dedica a la Caficultura y Agricultura, tiene varios años de experiencia en el cultivo de café y manejo de la tierra.- esta actividad a sido el sustento de su familia. 
Don Héctor está solicitando el credito para comprar un sistema solar y así progresar, él cree que al tener energía el podrá realizar trabajos en su casa en horas de la noche y así su trabajo sea más eficaz y continuo , respecto a sus hijos poder realizar sus tareas con una mejor visión ya que desde que iniciaron sus estudios les a tocado alumbrase por las noches con candiles y en ocasiones con candelas.
texts.en:
Hector Diobaldo is 40 years old.  He lives with his partner and has three children.  Hector grows coffee and farms.  He has several years experience in growing coffee and working the land.  This business activity has enabled him to support his family.

Hector is requesting a loan to buy a solar-energy system so that he can make progress.  He believes that having power will enable him to carry out work at home during the evening hours and so his work will be more efficient and continuous.  His children will also be able to carry out their work with better vision as, since they started school, they have had to light their home with oil lamps at night and sometimes with candles.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel

loans.name: Vilma Petronila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LOS COMERCIANTES”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Vilma;  La socia tiene 42 años de edad, la socia es casada, la socia tiene 5 hijos de los cuales 4 de ellos son independientes y la socia vive con uno de ellos de 12 años de edad; la socia tiene una tienda comercial de venta de productos de abarrotes y bazar, la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de gaseosas, ella tiene pensado comprar gaseosas en cajas de todo sabor para la venta. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de gaseosas en cajas para implementar el negocio.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Vilma is a member of the 'Los Comerciantes' community bank which is located in Andahuaylillas district, in Quispicanchis province, in Cusco department.

Vilma is 42 years old, married, and has five children.  Four of her children live independently but she still lives with one of her children who is 12 years old.  Vilma has a store where she sells groceries and miscellaneous products.  She would like to invest her loan in buying soda.  She plans to buy crates of soda in all flavors to sell.  She is requesting this loan to invest in buying crates of soda to stock her business.

Vilma is grateful for her loan and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to invest in buying crates of soda to stock her business

loans.name: Sara Maria

texts.es:
SARA MARIA.
La señorita  Sara Maria,  necesita otro refinanciamiento de crédito para poder invertir en la compra de productos de primera nececidad en el pueblo donde ella vive ya que en su pueblo se selebra el dia de los santos  ella aprovecha  esa festividad para poder crecer sus ingresos y tambien quiere invertir en la compra  y venta de tarjetas telefónicas de las  tres empresas  inicio su negocio desde hace 8 años  con la ayuda de sus papas ella pudo lograr lo que hasta ahora tiene  y agradece a la institución  por la confianza que le ha brindado  durante el tiempo que ella a trabajado con créditos su deseo es siempre seguir adelante  y a si poder ayudar económicamente a sus padres cuando tienen alguna enfermedad, y poder  crecer  más su negocio y surtirlo
texts.en:
Sara María needs another loan to be able to invest in buying household necessities in the town where she lives, since in her town they celebrate All Saints' Day.  She is taking advantage of this celebration to be able to increase her income.  She also wants to invest in buying and selling phone cards for the three companies.

She started her business eight years ago.  With the help of her parents she managed to achieve what she has up to the present.  She is grateful to the institution for the trust it has given her during the time that she has worked with loans.

Sara María's desire is always to get ahead, and so be able to help her parents financially when they have some illness, and be able to grow her business and stock it.

loans.use: to buy household necessities.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy footwear, clothes, cosmetics and treatments

loans.name: Jorge Ivan

texts.es:
el sr. Jorge Iván tiene 32 años de edad, está casado y es padre de 3 hijos, Jorge se dedica a la caficultura y tiene una experiencia de 5 años en el manejo del café, cuando la temporada de recolección de este grano termina se dedica a la albañilería, (construcción de viviendas).
Don Jorge utilizara el credito para comprar un sistema solar, para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos, actualmente se alumbran con candiles o candelas.
gracias a esta planta solar podra tener entretenimiento para sus hijos ya sea con TV o con Radio.
texts.en:
Jorge Iván is 32 years old.  He is married and the father of three children.  Jorge grows coffee and has five years experience in this line of work.  When the season for harvesting coffee beans is over, he carries out construction work (building houses).

Jorge will use his loan to buy a solar-energy system, to improve his own quality of life as well as that of his children.  They currently light their home with oil lamps or candles.

Thanks to this solar panel, Jorge will be able to provide entertainment for his children, either with a television set or a radio.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LOS COMERCIANTES”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Fortunata;  La socia tiene 42 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 2 hijos de 15 y 8 años de edad; la socia tiene su tienda de abarrotes, la socia también lleva verduras a Puerto Maldonado, la socia tiene terrenos de cultivos, la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de panetones, la socia también con parte del préstamo desea abonar sus terrenos de cultivo de maíz blanco para choclo. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de panetones porque se vienen las fiestas navideñas y también con parte de este dinero ella invertirá en abonar sus terrenos de cultivo de maíz blanco.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Fortunata is a member of the "Los Comerciantes" community bank which is located in Andahuaylillas district, in Quispicanchis province, in Cusco department.

Fortunata is 42 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children who are 15 and 8 years old.  Fortunata has a grocery store.  She also takes vegetables to sell in Puerto Maldonado.  Fortunata has land where she grows crops.  She would like to invest her loan in buying panettones.  She would also like to use part of her loan money to fertilize her white corn crop.  She is requesting this loan to invest in buying panettones because the Christmas holidays are approaching and will also invest part of her money in fertilizing her white corn crop.

Fortunata is grateful for her loan and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to invest in buying panettones because the Christmas holidays are approaching.  She will also invest part of her money in fertilizing her white corn crops

loans.name: Marvin Aristides

texts.es: Marvin Arístides se dedica a la venta de ropa, tiene 1 hijo de 2 años bajo su cargo, la responsabilidad de ser un padre abnegado han hecho que salga adelante. Actualmente solicita este crédito para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes y vestidos. pues se prepara para la alta temporada de Diciembre y planea complacer a sus clientes y vender mucho para aumentar sus utilidades.
texts.en: Marvin Arístides' business is selling clothes.  He has a 2-year-old son in his care.  The responsibility of being a self-sacrificing father has helped him move ahead in life.  Marvin is currently requesting this loan to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits and dresses as he is preparing for his peak season in December and plans to please his customers and sell a lot so that he can increase his profits.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits and dresses

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es: Paulina.  Trabaja , criando pollos , vendiendo en el mercado su venta D. consumo diario venD. los días martes jueves y domingo , venD. golosinas, gaseosas, chicles, galletas etc. Solicita el crédito para la compra D. maíz y frijol, galletas , chicles gaseosas,etc. Todo a lo que se refiere productos D. consumo diario Agradese a Dios primero por su crecimiento en su negocio.
texts.en: Paulina works raising chickens.  She also sells basic household products in the market.  She makes her sales on Tuesdays, Thursdays and Sundays.  She sells candies, soda, chewing gum, cookies, etc.  Paulina is requesting this loan to buy corn, beans, cookies, chewing gum, soda and other products which people consume every day.  First and foremost, she thanks God for the growth of her business.

loans.use: to buy basic household products

loans.name: Koribirama Group

texts.fr:
Gloriose est une commerçante âgée de 46ans qui habite la localité de Mutaho de la Province de Gitega au centre du pays. Elle a une boulangerie pour fabriquer du pain depuis 22 ans, un métier qu’elle commence alors qu’elle était vendait des articles divers dans sa boutique. Elle a fait ses études jusqu’en 4e année primaire. Elle est mariée et mère de 10 enfants qui étudient tous.
 Le crédit Kiva  de 200,000 francs burundais qu’elle obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter une grande quantité de farine de blé pour fabriquer beaucoup de pains à revendre  afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices et accroitre ses économies. 

Elle est membre  du groupe  communautaire« KORIBIRAMA»
texts.en:
Gloriose is a 46-year-old storekeeper who lives in Mutaho, in the province of Gitega in the center of the country. She has a bakery where she has been baking bread for 22 years. She started the business while also managing a small store selling miscellaneous items.  She completed four years of schooling. She is married and the mother of 10 children who are all in school.
The Kiva loan of 200,000 francs will help her to increase her capital to purchase a large quantity of flour to bake a lot of bread to resell at a large profit and to increase savings.

She is a member of the community group "KORIBIRAMA."

loans.use: to increase her capital to purchase a large quantity of flour to bake a lot of bread to resell at a large profit and to increase savings.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
el sr. Juan Francisco tiene 65 años de edad, es casado y sus hijos ya son mayores de edad, a unos hijos los logro sacar adelante con los estudios, con grandes esfuerzos los gradúo de carreras universitarias, tiene dos hijos que estan estudiando en la universidad toda via.
Don Juan Francisco se dedica a la Caficultura y Agricultura, tiene mucha experiencia en el cultivo y manejo del café, el credito lo utilizara para comprar un sistema solar para mejorar sus condiciones de vida, y realizar algunas tareas por las noches e incluso ahora dice que sus hijos podrán hacer uso de computadoras portátiles en su casa y ya no viajar hasta el pueblo para realizar trabajos o tareas que le dejan en las universidades.
texts.en:
Juan Francisco is 65 years old, married, and his children are already grown up.  He managed to support some of his children in their studies and, with a lot of effort, he managed to see them graduate from their degree courses at university.  He has two children who are still studying at university.

Juan Francisco grows coffee and farms.  He has a lot of experience growing coffee.  He will use his loan to buy a solar-energy system to improve his living conditions and to carry out some tasks in the evenings.  He says that his children will now even be able to use laptop computers at home and not have to travel to the village to carry out work or tasks that they have from university.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel

loans.name: Las Palmeras Group

texts.es:
María cuenta con 60 de años de edad, es madre soltera tiene 5 hijos los cuales todos ya están casados y son independientes, sus hijos le brindan ayuda económica lo cual doña María lo agradece mucho, pero sin embargo ella es una mujer trabajadora y cuenta con un negocio de cenas y refrescos desde hace 7 años,  lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para la elaboración de la comida y comprar refrescos de varios sabores.

Ella espera que su préstamo le ayude un poco más ya que le gustaría que incrementara un poco más ya que quiere ampliar el lugar donde vende.

María pertenece al grupo las palmeras el cual está integrado por 11 personas 2 hombres y 9 mujeres a continuación serán mencionadas:
Hugo, Marisol, Adela, Karina, Rafael, Abias, Ruth, Mirna, Ángela Rafael, Berta, todos realizan una actividad comerciante como son: cosméticos, transporte urbano, productos de abarrotes, curiosidades, carnicería, venta de animales, plásticos, etc.
texts.en:
María is 60 years old. She is a single mother with 5 children, who are all married and independent. Her children provide her with economic assistance, which María greatly appreciates. However, she is a hard-working woman, and for the past 7 years, she has operated a business selling meals and soft drinks. She will invest her loan in buying supplies to use for preparing the food, and she will also buy soft drinks in various flavors. 

She hopes that her loan will help her get ahead a little more, since she would like her business to grow, and she wants to expand the site where she sells her products. 

María belongs to "Las Palmeras" ["The Palms"] communal bank, which is made up of 11 people, 2 men and 9 women. The other members are Hugo, Marisol, Adela, Karina, Rafael, Abias, Ruth, Mirna, Ángela Rafael and Berta.
